programme.title: Walking with
programme.desc: The comedian better known to some as Vic Reeves explores a fascinating corner of the Kent coast as he walks down to Dungeness. Along the way he meets locals, explores military ruins and rides a steam train

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don travels to South America, home to more than 50,000 endemic plant species. Beginning in Brazil, the intrepid horticulturist views the private oasis of artist Burle Marx, and takes a trip by boat to the unique floating gardens of the Amazon, before visiting the coast of Chile - where an agriculturalist has created a landscape in tune with its craggy locale

programme.title: Oak Tree: Natures Greatest Survivor
programme.desc: George McGavin explores one of the great icons of the British countryside - the oak tree. Studying a 400-year-old tree throughout the different seasons of the year, George investigates its surprisingly sophisticated biology, how it adapts to its ever-changing environment and why it has become such an important part of the countryside

programme.title: Banned! The Mary Whitehouse Story
programme.desc: Part one of two. Looking back at the life of Mary Whitehouse, the teacher and housewife who ran a 30-year campaign to turn back the tide the permissive culture she saw sweeping through society with the advent of the sexual revolution. The programme revisits some of her campaigns, including boycotts against films like Last Tango In Paris, and features first-hand testimony from the people who knew her and studied her work

programme.title: Banned! The Mary Whitehouse Story
programme.desc: Part two of two. In the 1970s, Marys battle with permissive society heats up as ideas of progress and suggestions that nothing should be censored gain currency, and intent on being the nations moral guardian, she takes her battles to the courts. Later, the programme looks back at Marys final campaigning phase, where she gets closer to the seat of power than anyone thought possible with her relationship with Mrs Thatcher

programme.title: Genius of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Bettany Hughes series exploring the lives and teachings of influential ancient philosophers draws to a close with a profile of Confucius, who is credited as the first Chinese thinker to take a systematic philosophical approach to issues of social, political and ethical importance. Born during the chaotic Spring and Autumn period of Chinese history, Confucius believed that harmony could be promoted and achieved through the examples of sage rulers. He was also a innovative teacher, and tried to instill his principles of moral excellence in Chinas elite, but died without seeing his vision for his nation come to pass. However, his philosophies would eventually form the bedrock of Chinese culture, with many of his principles of tradition surviving to this day

programme.title: The Story of Welsh Art
programme.desc: Huw Stephens reveals how, as the 20th century dawned, artists found radical new ways to depict Wales, pushing themselves to extremes and redefining what art could be. His venture takes him to the National Museum Wales in Cardiff, Bardsey Island off the Llyn Peninsula, Colwyn Bay and Swansea

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don travels to South America, home to more than 50,000 endemic plant species. Beginning in Brazil, the intrepid horticulturist views the private oasis of artist Burle Marx, and takes a trip by boat to the unique floating gardens of the Amazon, before visiting the coast of Chile - where an agriculturalist has created a landscape in tune with its craggy locale

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: The former steeplejack sets out on an enthusiastic tour of Britains industrial heritage, exploring the early use of wind and water power and visiting some steam engines still in use today. On his travels Fred meets a man who has built a windmill in his back garden and hunts for examples of early beam engines that are still functioning today

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: Liz McIvor explores how Britains expanding rail network was the spark to a social revolution, starting in the 1800s and continuing through to modern times. She begins by examining the introduction of precise railway schedules and timetables that recognised Greenwich Mean Time. However, in a country made up of separate local time zones, with clocks in the west set several minutes behind those in the east, not everyone was keen to step in line

programme.title: Britains Lost Masterpieces
programme.desc: Social historian Emma Dabiri and Dr Bendor Grosvenor travel to Glasgow to investigate a long-lost picture of George Villiers, Duke of Buckingham, who was the lover of James VI of Scotland, possibly painted by one of the most famous artists in history

programme.title: Call My Bluff
programme.desc: Robert Robinson oversees another duel of words and wit as Frank Muir, Sue Cook and Bryan Forbes take on Arthur Marshall, Nanette Newman and Paul Eddington. First broadcast in 1981

programme.title: Face the Music
programme.desc: Joseph Cooper invites viewers to match their musical wits against panellists Arianna Stassinopoulos, Richard Baker and David Attenborough. With guest musician Erich Leinsdorf. First broadcast in 1975

programme.title: Arena
programme.sub-title: The Orson Welles Story: Arena - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. A profile of the director, actor and writer, including an interview in which he reflects on his long career in the film industry from the success of Citizen Kane up to his work on Touch of Evil. Featuring contributions by Jeanne Moreau, John Huston, Peter Bogdanovich, Robert Wise and Charlton Heston

programme.title: Arena
programme.sub-title: The Orson Welles Story: Arena - Part Two
programme.desc: In the second of two documentaries about the directors life and work, Welles discusses more of his films, including The Trial, Chimes at Midnight, The Immortal Story and F for Fake. He also talks about his unfinished projects - The Other Side of the Wind and Don Quixote. Alan Yentobs interview with Welles is interspersed with the thoughts of other cinematic luminaries, including John Huston, Jeanne Moreau, Peter Bogdanovich and Anthony Perkins

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: The former steeplejack sets out on an enthusiastic tour of Britains industrial heritage, exploring the early use of wind and water power and visiting some steam engines still in use today. On his travels Fred meets a man who has built a windmill in his back garden and hunts for examples of early beam engines that are still functioning today

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation

However, in a country made up of separate local time zones, with clocks in the west set several minutes behind those in the east, not everyone was keen to step in line

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Highlights of the latest Premier League matches, including Crystal Palace v Liverpool at Selhurst Park and Manchester City v Burnley at Etihad Stadium. The Eagles and Liverpool had already met once this term in the Community Shield, with Palace prevailing on penalties after a 2-2 draw. The Clarets faced a tough test away to the Citizens, who beat them 3-1 here when the sides last met two seasons ago. Plus, Brentford v Manchester United, Chelsea v Brighton and Hove Albion, Leeds United v Bournemouth, Nottingham Forest v Sunderland and Tottenham Hotspur v Wolverhampton Wanderers

programme.title: Prayer and Reflection

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Jonathan Pratt and Irita Marriott guide the teams at Uttoxeter Racecourse, while in Llangollen, Christina Trevanion quizzes passers-by about a mystery object

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: Angela Barnes presents an appeal on behalf of Sarcoma UK, a rare cancer charity that provides support services for people, funds research for new treatments and gives critical help to anyone diagnosed with sarcoma and their families

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Sarah Moore gives an old tartan picnic rug to bag-maker Rosanna Gethin and a set of tired chairs to upcycler Rachel Henderson, while she restyles a vintage glass display cabinet

programme.title: Garden Rescue
programme.desc: In Ellesmere Port, James wants to turn his neglected garden into a Cornish coastal haven, providing a safe space for his dog and visiting family. Enter Charlie Dimmock and Lee Burkhill with competing designs. Which one will James decide to go with?

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Denise Nurse helps a couple to find a new home closer to their son in Northumberland, and also pays a visit to the Northumberland National Park

programme.title: Attenborough and the Giant Sea Monster
programme.desc: The veteran naturalist investigates the discovery of a lifetime - the skull of a pliosaur, one of the most ferocious Jurassic predators ever known. This prehistoric marine reptile ruled the seas 150 million years ago, at the same time dinosaurs reigned on land. It measured up at an incredible 12 metres long and boasted phenomenal strength. David has been an avid fossil collector since he was a boy, but he has never come across a find quite like this. He follows two of the UKs most intrepid fossil hunters on their perilous expedition to excavate the skull from its resting place 12 metres up in a cliff face

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Matt Baker and Charlotte Smith are in Wrexham for the biggest date in the sheepdog trialling calendar - the Supreme. Set against the beautiful backdrop of Brynkinalt Estate, the finest dogs and handlers from across the UK and Ireland go head-to-head, showing off their skill, instinct and teamwork. After months of training and a year of tough qualifying trials, it all comes down to this - only one can walk away as Supreme Champion

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The Roadshow visits Lister Park and Cartwright Hall in Bradford, where treasures include a jewel-encrusted gold bunny brooch, a portrait of a dog and an ancient stone head. Joanna Hardy challenges Fiona Bruce to Basic, Better, Best with three exquisite items of Art Deco jewellery, ranging in price from £20,000 to a staggering £100,000. Meanwhile, Richard Price is thrilled to see a 1970s Patek Philippe watch made from glistening tigers eye gemstones and diamonds, which was given as a wedding present to the owner

programme.title: Freddie Flintoffs Field of Dreams
programme.sub-title: Freddie Flintoffs Field of Dreams: Ultimate Test
programme.desc: Freddie expands his roster of coaches to help with the growing responsibility of managing his new cricket teams, but a training session does not go as planned. To help attract the next generation of young players to their club, some reluctant girls are roped in to deliver a cricket training session at a local primary school, with surprising and heartwarming results

programme.title: King and Conqueror
programme.desc: Sacrifices have to be made when Harold strikes against a Viking invader and William seeks a fleet. Edith fears for the future, while Matilda moves to secure hers

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Highlights of the latest Premier League matches, featuring Newcastle United v Arsenal at St James Park and Aston Villa v Fulham at Villa Park. Newcastle won three of the four meetings between them and the Gunners in all competitions last term, including a 1-0 victory here in the league. Villa defeated the Cottagers home and away last season, but had found goals hard to come by in the early stages of the current campaign

programme.title: The Womens Football Show
programme.desc: Highlights of the weekends games in the Super League, including West Ham United v Chelsea, Liverpool v Manchester United and Arsenal v Aston Villa

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy doesnt want to see Jamma anymore, so when Jamma meets a magical stranger who offers to unburden him from his clownish ways to win Guy back, he decides to take the deal and is transformed. Guy has a photo shoot for his book cover, but doesnt want to look boring, so Isaac offers to style him in exchange for free therapy. Comedy, co-written by and starring Mawaan Rizwan, with Russell Tovey

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: The new Jamma is reliable and consistent - he wants to respect Guys boundaries, but also needs Saifs address from Guy so he can try to reconnect with his father. Winnies dad is visiting for some quality father-daughter bonding, but shes not yet come out as straight to him and asks Isaac to play along. Comedy, starring Mawaan Rizwan, Russell Tovey and Emily Lloyd-Saini

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show
programme.desc: The host returns with a roster of guests including Hollywood stars Dwayne Johnson and Emily Blunt, who are appearing together in true-life sports drama The Smashing Machine. Oscar-winning actor and writer Matthew McConaughey chats about his survival thriller The Lost Bus, and James Norton discusses his role in Steven Knights new period succession drama House of Guinness. Plus, singer-songwriter RAYE chats and performs her new single Where Is My Husband!

programme.title: SAS: Catching the Criminals

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts and the team explore properties about to be auctioned online in Stoke-on-Trent, Chestfield in Kent and west London. They are later bought by developers who hope to make money on their investments - two projects are destined for the rental market, while the third is about building new houses and selling them on

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It
programme.desc: Mark Wright, cleaning expert Maxine Dwyer and DIY master Tommy Walsh have just two days to help retired nurse Hayley, who has a health condition

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda Holden and Alan Carr bag another house for one euro, this time in the idyllic region of northern Tuscany. Alan purchases a dilapidated 17th-century house with a medieval watchtower in the rural hamlet of Fornovolasco, and ropes in Amanda to spend their summer transforming it into another Italian dream home. However, arriving at the property for the first time, they discover its been left empty since the previous owner died and a massive restoration job lies ahead

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Nicki Chapman helps a couple from Wolverhampton to find a new home and lifestyle in Shropshire, before braving an outdoors adventure playground with a giant zip wire

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.sub-title: How Much Is That Puppy in the Shed?
programme.desc: Izzie Balmer and JJ Chalmers help a couple who need to repair and redecorate their Chingford home. A small box uncovers a treasure trove of jewellery, exciting auctioneer Izzie, and commemorative coins will also appeal to keen collectors at the auction. Restoration expert JJ converts his mobile workshop into a dog-grooming parlour, where he restores a womans childhood toy dog to its former glory

programme.title: The Answer Run
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the fast-paced quiz show where three couples face a series of 50/50 questions which hurtle down the Answer Run towards them. Across three rounds, the couples build up their cash pots, but only one pair can face the Final Run and earn the opportunity to take home their cash prize

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by co-host Angela Rippon on the quiz in which contestants try to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious correct answers

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Alex Jones and Roman Kemp present the first visit of the week to the One Show studio, featuring the usual mix of topical stories and celebrity chat

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Peter pulls rank as he plans a surprise that could backfire, Stacey makes a decision for her family, and Harry is overwhelmed by a growing situation

programme.title: Restoration Rescue
programme.desc: Architect Patrick Bradley meets a couple in Londonderry who are on a mission to restore a Georgian estate with a fascinating history, and turn it into their new family home. After decades of decline, its one of the most daunting restoration projects Patricks ever encountered and, when work finally gets going, its not long before the challenges start mounting up, as they find out much of the original timbers holding the house together are riddled with woodworm and wet rot

programme.title: Panorama
programme.desc: Reporter Rahil Sheikh travels to the North West of England to meet residents, community leaders, asylum seekers and refugees as he investigates the asylum hotels that have dominated the news over the summer. He searches for solutions to the migrant crisis and asks where asylum seekers will be housed if the hotels are closed

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: Drama following three new recruits to Belfasts police force. The arrest of young drug dealer Sandy McKnight begins to expose a criminal conspiracy involving every level of Belfasts society, from wealthy businesswoman Dana Morgan to vulnerable teenager Lindsay Singleton.

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: Stitched Up? Surgery in the Sun
programme.desc: Cosmetic surgery abroad promises transformation at a bargain, but behind the filters and hashtags, the risks are all too real. Journalist Aoife Moore gets under the skin of the multi-billion-pound medical tourism industry. She begins by talking to her cousin Sean, who travelled to Turkey four years ago for gastric sleeve surgery. In Lurgan, County Armagh, Aoife meets online influencer Chloe, who is about to head to Istanbul to have a boob job

programme.title: Trying
programme.desc: Nikki and Jason volunteer to babysit their friends two children and take them on an unforgettable treasure hunt across London

programme.title: Trying
programme.desc: Attending a mandatory adoption course, Nikki and Jason have a different outlook on how to parent. Jason wonders whether they have bitten off more than they can chew

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: The honeymooners are elated when boats bring their friends and family from the other side of the world, ready to give their opinions on their new partners And while double dates deliver some home truths, one couple decide to wave goodbye to their stranded dream for ever. Presented by Davina McCall

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: A full moon party is thrown at the final Couples Cove. When events take a surprising turn, one pair is left questioning their future, before the honeymooners leave their beaches to spend time apart contemplating their relationships. Reality dating show, hosted by Davina McCall

programme.desc: The Slaters are still in shock from last nights ordeal - but they remain suspicious when Zoe continues to evade the truth. Sharon arrives back in Walford and is surprised to see Zoe, Cindy causes tension between Lauren and Peter and an accident at the Albert leads to Mos firing

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Sharon offers Phil an olive branch after an awkward encounter, while Vicki and Zoe have an altogether more violent encounter in the Square. Howie gets a job delivering parcels, and Cindy is impressed by the initiative of Jasmine, a girl applying for a job at the Albert

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Ian tries to convince Sharon that Zoe is lying. Stacey tells Lily that Sean has invited them to live with him in Brazil. Penny orders Peter to tell Lauren the truth about his mystery woman. Jasmine makes a good impression with Cindy, but its clear Elaine isnt a fan

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Kat enlists Staceys help to plant a memorial for Zoes daughter in the Square gardens, and Zoe starts to thaw to her mum. Lily is over the moon when Stacey announces shes booked their flights to Brazil, but the moment is broken when Jean arrives. Peter is horrified to hear Lauren and Demi laughing at his expense. Oscar asks Jasmine out on a date by stealing her an outfit from the market

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: The honeymooners are elated when boats bring their friends and family from the other side of the world, ready to give their opinions on their new partners And while double dates deliver some home truths, one couple decide to wave goodbye to their stranded dream for ever. Presented by Davina McCall

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: A full moon party is thrown at the final Couples Cove. When events take a surprising turn, one pair is left questioning their future, before the honeymooners leave their beaches to spend time apart contemplating their relationships. Reality dating show, hosted by Davina McCall

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.sub-title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island: The Final Flare
programme.desc: Back in civilisation, the honeymooners are paid a surprise visit from presenter Davina McCall, who reveals they will all face one final flare-out. Will they choose to commit to each other in the real world, or will they leave their relationships behind on Honeymoon Island for ever?

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: Former UFC fighter Elwood Dalton is determined to put his life of violence in the ring behind him but times are tough and he struggles to make ends meet - until bar owner Frankie makes him a proposition. She needs a head bouncer to protect her Florida Keys bar from a criminal and his rabble-rousing associates. It seems easy enough - until he comes up against a psychotic gun-for-hire determined to pummel him into submission. Remake of the 1989 Patrick Swayze thriller, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Daniela Melchior and Conor McGregor

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The nervous energy is palpable as 12 brand new queens enter the werk room to meet their fellow competitors and judge supremo RuPaul for the very first time. In this race, nothing is predictable, and in their very first challenge, Ru has an extra-special challenge in store for the queens. In a Drag Race UK first, the queens display show-stopping looks as they attend the biggest night in fashion - the star-studded Brit Gala. Comedian and presenter Joel Dommett guests on the judging panel, alongside Michelle Visage and Alan Carr

programme.title: Charlie Coopers Myth Country
programme.desc: The writer and actor tours the UK in his campervan, exploring local legends, myths and folklore and gathering evidence in a bid to get to the truth. He begins by going in search of Black Shuck, the demon dog of East Anglia, attempting an overnight stakeout to capture it on film, with unexpected consequences

programme.title: BBC Comedy Short Films
programme.desc: Very average woman Spud cooks, cleans, serves and cares for her father. The only problem is she does it all rather badly - and half-heartedly. A woman who is never seen, unattractive and ignored, she does not feel bad about herself. However, when her father dies, she starts to realise she may have to come out from the shadow and be seen. Comedy drama, written by and starring Siobhan McSweeney

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.sub-title: Horrible Histories: Awesome Alfred the Great Special
programme.desc: A look at the life of the English king, who defeats the Viking by using cunning tactics and summoning the spirit of Ed Sheeran. Starring Tom Rosenthal

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: An episode focusing on the life and career of French military leader and ruler Napoleon Bonaparte, following his rise from humble beginnings to being crowned emperor of France. Plus, the programme meets the Indian traveller who brought shampoo to the world. Guest starring Sanjeev Bhaskar

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The three hosts are each given a budget of £5,000 to find a car that can hold its own on a racetrack and handle everyday tasks, before testing their purchases in Germany. James May puts two Porsches through their paces on the Top Gear test circuit, and former Downing Street communications director Alastair Campbell tries out the Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island: Australia
programme.desc: Australian version of the romantic reality show. Six couples have been matched and will now marry and spend the next 21 days stranded on a string of Pacific islands

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island: Australia
programme.desc: Romance is in the air as relationships blossom before a reality check puts on the brakes for one couple. Mysterious crates wash up on the island, revealing insights into the couples pasts, which means a better understanding of their partners

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island: Australia
programme.desc: The six couples hit day five of this crazy dating adventure and face gale force winds. A shower promises romance, while the first group gathering at Couples Cove serves up more controversy and drama than ever expected

programme.title: Bad Influencer: The Great Insta Con
programme.desc: The rise and fall of internet wellness guru Belle Gibson, who cultivated an adoring online following with the story that she had successfully treated her own cancer by eating a plant-based diet and using alternative natural therapies. There was one major problem with Belles story - she never had cancer

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy doesnt want to see Jamma anymore, so when Jamma meets a magical stranger who offers to unburden him from his clownish ways to win Guy back, he decides to take the deal and is transformed. Guy has a photo shoot for his book cover, but doesnt want to look boring, so Isaac offers to style him in exchange for free therapy. Comedy, co-written by and starring Mawaan Rizwan, with Russell Tovey

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: The new Jamma is reliable and consistent - he wants to respect Guys boundaries, but also needs Saifs address from Guy so he can try to reconnect with his father. Winnies dad is visiting for some quality father-daughter bonding, but shes not yet come out as straight to him and asks Isaac to play along. Comedy, starring Mawaan Rizwan, Russell Tovey and Emily Lloyd-Saini

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: My Muddy Buddy/Mushlers to the Rescue/Shine, Lilit, Shine/Eyes on the Surprise/The Show Mush Go On/Mushpots Treasure
programme.desc: When Lilit creates a ‘friends tree’ mapping out who everyone is best friends with in Mushton, she realizes Muddler has no friends at all. / Having rescued a Mushlet, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit becomes heroes in Mushton, and they’re loving it! / The Beacon Mushroom that guides the Mushables back to Mushton in the dark has gone out. / Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was. He tries to get the gang to adopt him. / Grizzy battles with the Lemmings over the couch. / Grizzy discovers that the frenzied break dance the Lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. / Grizzy is thirsty but the river bed has dried up. / The Lemmings have caught a little spider. Her sticky, elastic threads are absolutely perfect for bungee jumping. / Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over chocolate-spread jar lids, which they use as chips in a competition to win goodies. / Grizzys TV dinner is interrupted by unexplained static. / The Lemmings are having a rave party. When Grizzy throws their ghetto blaster into the river, he sparks a general power outage.

All the Mushables are happy for them except Fung and Miff who keep mocking them. / When Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit take their compost meals back to their home-tree to eat, they think they have made a great new discovery.

programme.title: Love Monster
programme.desc: Everyone in Fluffytown is gathered for a communal nap ahead of the big Siesta Fiesta Day celebration - because the better the nap, the better the party afterwards. Elder Chick demonstrates the Fluffytown nap timer and explains when she presses the button its time to snooze, and when the hand reaches the balloon, its time for the Siesta Fiesta. She starts the timer, and everyone hurries off to their nap stations to begin their naps. As the other Fluffytowners start to doze off, Love Monster struggles to fall asleep. After trying a pre-nap workout with Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny, practising yoga with Book Cub and pillow drumming with Bad Idea Puppy, a frustrated Love Monster gives up and thinks he might as well start getting ready for the party. He heads over to his decks and puts on a song just before the sleep timer goes off, and everyone awakes full of energy. As everyone boogies to the beats, Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny looks over to the decks, but Love Monster is nowhere to be seen. She goes around the back of the decks and finds him curled up underneath them, finally fast asleep. Sometimes, when you give up the struggle, you find the snuggle.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Newfoundland Sylvie is a big therapy dog with big soft cuddles who loves to help people when theyre worried. She and her owner, Katrina, visit all sorts of people every day, young and old. Today Sylvie and Katrina are visiting a doctors surgery to help a little boy called Ben. Ben has fallen off his scooter and grazed his knee, and his mum says hes too nervous to come into the doctors room. Sylvies mission is to help Ben feel brave enough to see Dr Stevens. First, she gives Ben one of her biggest and best cuddles. Then, she and Dr Stevens show Ben how a doctor treats a patient. Sylvie loves performing in the starring role. Ben finally feels brave enough to go into the doctors room with his mum. But when Ben gets frightened and runs from the room, Sylvie must use all her superpowers to help him be braver still.

programme.title: The Dog House
programme.desc: Compilation of highlights from the documentary set inside Woodgreen animal charity, including a couple having to choose between a French bulldog and a nervous terrier, a jack russell finding a family that need a dog able to keep up with them, and a dog offering to pull his prospective owners wheelchair along

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition begins with Nick and Tim at Home Farm BandB in Milton Keynes, where secrets get revealed during a visit to the home of Second World War code breakers

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The weeks second visit takes the BandBers to Cricklade in Wiltshire, where Iain and Tayla host at The Vale Hotel. Their breakfast-free, no frills ethos has some of the guests worried, but its the proximity to a main road that causes the most concern for one pair. Over drinks, the gang try an intimacy exercise that leaves Tayla in an awkward position, before the noisy neighbourhood is cause for much consternation in the feedback

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Francesca and Maurizio host the weeks third visit at Cottage Lodge Hotel in Brockenhurst in The New Forest. The pair have a background in high-end hotels, and their green approach to hospitality leaves some of the BandBers impressed but a tree hugging trip divides the group in the afternoon. The hosts passion for local produce takes pride of place at breakfast but theyre left with a sour taste over their facilities scores

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Husband-and-wife team Karl and Rohini host the weeks final visit, at Beach Sun Retreat in Dymchurch, Kent. Their unusual offering proves an acquired taste for some, as not everyone finds the onsite meditation experience as relaxing as intended. Drinks on the pairs indoor beach brightens the mood, but some are left feeling less enlightened by the veggie breakfast the next morning

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Its payment day and the BandBers take each other to task about some dodgy comments made throughout the week, before the payments are revealed and the winners crowned

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The bakers return to school, starting off with the classic canteen favourite, flapjacks, before being tested with a fondly remembered school cake technical, with a catch. For their final exam, they have to produce a spectacular school fete showstopper, full of nostalgic treats. Mr Hollywood and Ms Leith judge their efforts, before deciding which of the students to expel

programme.title: Hotel Chocolat Unwrapped
programme.desc: Part one of two. Behind the scenes at the chocolatier, from its inventing rooms and factory floor, to the cacao-filled tropical forests. The first episode focuses on one of the designers trying to get his first ever chocolate invention - a fiery chilli maple - into production. A plan is made to open a branch in Chicago, and an executive chef heads to the St Lucian cacao farm in search of inspiration for a new line of savoury pastries

programme.title: Educating Yorkshire
programme.desc: GCSEs are edging closer, and students Skyler, Olivia and Falak are feeling the pressure. While Maths teacher Mrs Delaney-Hudson is determined to see her pupils succeed, headteacher Mr Burton leads a crackdown on mobile phone use. Year 11 student and prefect Falak is struggling with anxiety as the pressure to achieve high grades starts to feel overwhelming. Plus, a special guest returns to the school

programme.title: The Disappearance of Jay Slater
programme.desc: Insight into the case of a British teenager who disappeared in Tenerife in the summer of 2024, and how mass online interest set conspiracy theories flying, causing a social media storm led by true-crime keyboard detectives. Featuring never-before-seen CCTV footage, previously unheard audio, the discovery of unsent messages, and access to the Slater family as they search for answers. This documentary is the only media in the world granted full access to the post-mortem, funeral and inquest

programme.title: Catching My Stalker
programme.desc: Documentary following a couple who were pursued by a dangerous and relentless stalker. Realising the police could not help, they took matters into their own hands, recording every detail of their lives to obtain evidence. Featuring intimate interviews with the couple and access to their cache of evidence - obsessive messages, voice notes, and footage from doorbell cameras and police bodycams

programme.title: Father Stu
programme.desc: From an early age, Stuart Long yearns to impress his hard-drinking father Bill, but the death of his brother Stephen, creates a rift in the family. Stu, an amateur boxer, decides to try his luck as an actor in Hollywood, and while working in a grocery store, he falls for Carmen, a member of the Catholic Church. Its a meeting which changes his life for ever. Drama, starring Mark Wahlberg, Mel Gibson, Teresa Ruiz and Malcolm McDowell

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads for the Grasshopper Also in Carlstadt, New Jersey, a family-owned Irish restaurant. There, he lends a helping hand to Mitch Sandler, who has been struggling to live up to the expectations of his father-in-law since he invested heavily in the business. The chef also tries to improve the presentation of dishes emerging from the kitchen

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Springfield Elementary is threatened with closure over poor test scores, until it is revealed that one student missed the exam and could potentially save the school with an above-average mark. Unfortunately, that pupil turns out to be Bart - can he pull it out of the bag?

programme.title: Banel and Adama
programme.desc: The brother of a tribal chief in a Senegalese village agrees to marry his dead siblings widow. The tribal elders considered an honourable act, but are unaware the new couple have been in love for years. They soon court controversy with their attitudes to leadership and parenthood, and face condemnation when a drought strikes the village. Drama, starring Khady Mane and Mamadou Diallo. In Pular and Peul with English subtitles

Theres also the story of a man who built a home for his daughter in his back garden for just £12,000, and Georges own garden project takes shape, as he and Will Hardie attempt to erect the entire studio structure in 15 minutes

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Carrie discovers how lonely Spence is, so she arranges a blind date with one of her colleagues - and he promptly falls in love. Comedy, starring Kevin James

programme.desc: Debra gets angry with Ray for investing $1,000 of his money in a go-kart firm without consulting her first. Ray Romano and Patricia Heaton star

programme.desc: Marie gathers Roberts ex-girlfriends Amy and Stefania and his police partner together in an attempt to work out why her eldest son cannot commit to a relationship

programme.desc: Special episode filmed on location in Seattle. Frasier is guest of honour at a public rally to mark his 1,000th radio show - but the celebrations go awry as Niless jealousy reaches new peaks. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.desc: The shrink is asked to be a guest speaker on an all-star cruise, and invites the family to accompany him. However, the so-called celebrities also appearing are not exactly famous. Meanwhile, Niless marital problems worsen once he discovers Maris will also be coming along

programme.desc: Samantha ends her relationship with Frasier on their return from a seemingly perfect weekend away, leaving him desperate to find out where he went wrong. However, Niles helps him realise that he only liked his new woman for her famous friends. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer

programme.desc: Channel 4s midday news summary

Having recently retired, hes set his sights on finding a holiday bolthole in its Puglia region to escape to at various times of the year. With best friend John also on hand to lend his support, Mark would love to find a three-bedroom townhouse. Property expert Laura Hamilton also helps him deliver his dream on an £80,000 budget

And in central Italy, Cesidio prepares to welcome his daughter Sofia and her family from Scotland, continuing a historical cycle that began with his grandfathers emigration

Unfortunately, Richard and Mick are less impressed by some cleanliness scores that they just cant brush off

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: The Garners and the Rodriguezes revisit previous clients to discover how their property purchases and lives have been transformed since moving to Spain. In the Costa Blanca, in the province of Alicante, sisters Sophie and Charlotte Rodriguez catch up with ex-Army duo Kevin and Linda who, back in 2019, arrived with polar opposite property wishes. Fast forward two years and the sisters are back to find out if the couple are now marching to the same beat and living their shared dream. In Almería, Sharon and Steve Garner catch up with former client Mary, who left Irelands Co Kildare after she bagged a bargain abode for 25,000 euros under its asking price

programme.title: Channel 4 News

Plus, Poppy Cooks, the self-proclaimed queen of potatoes, demonstrates a couple of her favourite potato dishes

programme.title: Lucy Letby: Murder or Mistake

programme.title: Lucy Letby: Murder or Mistake

programme.desc: Ten-year-old Henry is brought to Queens Medical Centre in Nottingham after being hit accidentally by a forklift truck driven by his dad. X-rays confirm that both his legs are broken. Nahum and Dean arrive by ambulance following a road traffic accident, and 94-year-old Pearl comes in after badly cutting her arm by trapping it in a lift

programme.title: Educating Yorkshire
programme.desc: GCSEs are edging closer, and students Skyler, Olivia and Falak are feeling the pressure. programme.title: The Great British Bake Off: An Extra Slice
programme.desc: Guests Joel Dommett, Finlay Christie and Prue Leith help Jo Brand and Tom Allen recall events in Back to School Week. The hosts also catch up with the fourth baker to leave the tent, scrutinise the audience cakes and look at some viewers home baking pictures

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: The contestants have a tricky time identifying someone in the lab, leading Phil Ellis to ponder a 1980s pop group and Maisie Adam to rely on the lyrics to a 1990s dance tune. Ania Magliano is unsure of the difference between snakes and worms, Sanjeev Bhaskar creates a disturbing tableau and Reece Shearsmith gets quite angry with a large yellow cube. Taskmaster Greg Davies issues the points, though assistant Alex Horne very often agrees with his decisions

programme.title: The Donald Trump Show
programme.desc: A novel take on the US presidents second term in office, recutting archive news clips as drama to retell his story. Donald tackles the worlds biggest problems. He sets out an unlikely foreign policy agenda and is forced to make some big decisions about which wars to get involved in, and whose side hes on. Trumps loose strategy keeps everyone guessing - with no one knowing what will happen

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer catch up with two couples who knew exactly where they wanted to live. Katrina and Nick were looking for their first place together as a couple on the small but pricey island of Jersey, while Helen and Rick had a search area of just four square miles in the popular Manchester suburbs of Hale and Altrincham, where they were hoping to find a family home

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Darrens world turns upside down, while Diane is forced to face her true feelings for Tony. Peri finds comfort in Tom as sparks fly during their date. Sienna decides to do whatever it takes to escape, and a shocking theory is shared about Robbies whereabouts. Also, Tonys case suffers a blow, and Clare celebrates when Donny delivers some news

programme.desc: Mummy and Daddy take Peppa and George to a castle to feast on medieval banquets, play King and Queen and meet a dragon

programme.desc: A pigeon comes down the chimney at 32 Windsor Gardens and Paddington nurses the poorly bird back to health

programme.desc: Jokey has a new prank: giving Grouchy a potion that makes him say okey dokey to every request

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick goes into a destructive tantrum whenever he hears a bell, so his friends help him in their own ways

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: Cruising with Susan Calman
programme.desc: The comedians summer cruise around the Adriatic continues with a visit to the high-rolling and fashionable Bay of Kotor in Montenegro. She continues with a trip to the beautiful old Croatian town of Dubrovnik with the cruise ships entertainment team, where she gets to visit a few of Game of Thrones most famous locations and relive some iconic scenes

programme.title: Holidaying with Jane McDonald: The Caribbean
programme.desc: Jane starts out on the trip of a lifetime as she island-hops solo around the Caribbean. She begins in Barbados, where she goes snorkelling with two fellow Brits from Yorkshire, and hires private tour guide Dawn Lisa to point out the magical sights that leave Jane in awe of the flora, fauna and culture of the island

programme.title: Holidaying with Jane McDonald: The Caribbean
programme.desc: Jane heads to St Lucia, taking a trip to the heart of the rainforest to get view of the flora and fauna from above the canopy, and going on a boat ride from the north to the south of the island en route to an outdoor hot tub heated by a volcano. Jane also meets Helen DeMacque-Crockett, aka Pepsi of Pepsi and Shirlie fame, who has St Lucian heritage and has moved to the island to run a sailboat charter business

programme.title: Cornwall with Fern Britton
programme.desc: Fern explores ancient regions with big histories in the form of West Wivelshire and Powdershire, which lie between the rivers of the Fowey and the Fal. Her first stop takes her to the historic Boconnoc Estate, before she heads to Fowey to learn more about much-loved author Daphne du Maurier

programme.title: Cornwall with Fern Britton
programme.desc: The last leg of the presenters road trip takes her to an industrious corner of Cornwall, the ancient Hundreds of Kerrier and Penwith. Fern discovers one of the best preserved ancient farming villages in the South West, which are among the oldest structures on the planet. Later, she visits the Lizard Peninsula, an area of outstanding natural beauty that as well as its unique landscape boasts a number of gems, including Cornish sea salt, Hevva Cake and Huer Huts. Finally, she meets some of the team from the RNLI at Lizard Point, the southernmost tip of mainland Britain

programme.title: Live: NFL Big Game Night
programme.desc: Pittsburgh Steelers v Minnesota Vikings (Kick-off 2.30pm). Osi Umenyiora and Nat Coombs are joined by reporter Ellie Evelyn for coverage of the week four match at Croke Park in Dublin. This is the first regular-season NFL match to take place in Ireland and features two teams who reached the play-offs last season, both falling at the wild card stage. It is the first meeting between the sides since December 2021, when the Vikings claimed a 36-28 home win

programme.title: Live: NFL Big Game Night
programme.desc: Detroit Lions v Cleveland Browns (Kick-off 6.00pm). Dermot OLeary and Sam Quek are joined by Osi Umenyiora for coverage of the week four match from Ford Field. The Lions are the only franchise operational for the entirety of the Super Bowl era to not appear in the showpiece match, but they recorded an excellent regular season record of 15-2 last time out before suffering a shock defeat at the hands of Washington Commanders in the Divisional Playoffs. In contrast, the Browns are looking to improve this time around after winning just three matches last term. Tonights coverage will also feature the game within a game quiz element, whenever the NFL game stops in the US

programme.title: Rich Holiday, Poor Holiday
programme.desc: Millionaire Cassy-Anne and her daughters Bug and Bunny ditch their usual luxury trips for a basic, no-frills one when they swap holidays with hard-up, nature-loving couple Sian and Joe. Never without their phones, Cassy-Anne and her girls have to cope without technology during their stay in shepherds hut in Dorset, while Sian and Joe have the run of a penthouse at an opulent five-star resort in Hvar, Croatia

programme.title: The Worlds Most Expensive Cruise Ships
programme.desc: The Seven Seas Splendor is docked in Southampton ahead of a cruise around the Mediterranean. Welcoming guests on-board this six-star, floating palace is a new entertainment team, while head sommelier Donovan laying on a variety of tasting events, offering up unusual high-end wines

programme.title: Hotel Benidorm: Fun-Loving Brits in the Sun
programme.sub-title: Hotel Benidorm: Fun Loving Brits in the Sun
programme.desc: As the sun rises on the Costa Blanca, the Hotel Benidorm Plazas housekeeping staff spring into action. Meanwhile, expat Jessie has an audition to be the new hotel entertainer, and cameras follow the Parrot family as they head to Benidorm to spend some precious family time together

programme.title: Friends

programme.desc: On the first night in Brighton, party-loving Pete and Jasons home-made-from-scratch Italian menu impresses Debbie but not her partner Richard, although they both enjoy a rare night out together. Meanwhile, Chris and Barb, whove been married for almost 30 years, enjoy the night but dont rate Pete and Jason as any kind of rivals to their well-honed party-throwing skills. Novice hosts and accomplished bickerers Debbie and Richard are up next, but tension in the kitchen spills over to the table, leading to some cold food and awkward chat. Finally, Chris and Barb rely on their years of hosting experience and teamwork skills to deliver a tried-and-tested menu, and throw in a little something extra

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Bettina and her husband Giovanni kick off the contest in West Sussex with an Italian menu. However, married couples Linda and Dave, and Chris and Ewelina, are unimpressed with Bettinas lack of home cooking. On day two, school inspectors Dave and Linda offer French fine dining. Inspired by their love of the countryside, they plan to use as much home-grown produce from their garden as possible. After Dave and Lindas comments on the first night, their guests are expecting everything to be home-made, leading to a dramatic revelation at dessert. Finally, Polish-born Ewelina and her husband Chris serve up a home-made menu. Ewelina takes control in the kitchen, while funnyman Chris does his best to distract her

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Married couple Rupert and Jo host first in Bournemouth, with a night based on their favourite travel destinations. programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Bournemouth, Dorset, Karen and her wife Lindsay kick-off the competition with an evening of trusted family favourites, winning over garrulous David and Elaine as well as newlyweds Matt and Jay. Finally, its David and Elaines chance to show the younger members of the competition how to throw a dinner party, providing they survive their incessant bickering in the kitchen

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

Raj goes out with the girls and reveals he had crushes on both Penny and Bernadette - but not Amy. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is not pleased when his assistant Alex starts flirting with Leonard and has a word with her about it. Unfortunately, his comments are so inappropriate that he is accused of sexual harassment and sent to the universitys human resources department, where he ends up dragging Leonard, Raj and Howard into trouble too. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: While Claire and Haley fall ill at the same time, Phil wages battle against a defective smoke detector after concluding it is saying youre not a man to him. Elsewhere, Manny accidentally gets one of Jays employees dismissed. Comedy, starring Ty Burrell and Julie Bowen

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Everyone gathers to celebrate Mannys birthday, but he is in the throes of a mini-crisis about getting older. Meanwhile, Phil and Claire engage in a car race, and Mitch and Cameron get sidetracked. American comedy following the lives of three dysfunctional households, starring Rico Rodriguez, Ty Burrell and Julie Bowen

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy take a train ride to the Napa Valley with Howard and Bernadette on Valentines Day, while Leonard and Penny head to the vets when they volunteer to look after Rajs dog. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonards purchase of a dining-room table causes Sheldon to re-evaluate his life. Meanwhile, Howard is offered the chance to go back to the International Space Station, and Bernadette struggles to decide whether to encourage him. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Melissa Rauch

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: After arguing with Sheldon, Howard tries to make amends by taking him to Nasas headquarters in Houston. Elsewhere, Penny has second thoughts about quitting her job as a waitress when her car dies, while Amy tries to find Raj a date. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon receives a nasty surprise when he visits his mother in Houston, while Rajs murder mystery party causes conflict for the rest of the gang members. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Part one of two. Peralta and Diaz adjust to life behind bars, but while Jake is forced to join a prison gang led by notorious inmate Romero, Rosa puts Captain Holt and Sgt Jeffords to the test by making outrageous lists of chores for her

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Part two of two. When the warden tells Peralta to investigate Romeros drug smuggling operation, Peralta finds himself trapped by divided loyalties. Meanwhile, Santiago is offered a deal by a local mobster who claims he can prove Lt Hawkins is guilty of the crimes that Diaz and Peralta were jailed for, but Holt and the team think they have found a safer plan. Tim Meadows, Lou Diamond Phillips and Gina Gershon guest star

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: In an episode set 30 years in the future, Bart and Lisa now have families of their own and decide to spend Christmas with Homer and Marge. However, when they turn to their parents for advice, the pair discover they have more in common with their mother and father than they realised

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: An impassioned video rant by Homer becomes an internet sensation and he is given his own talk show. Before long the lovable oaf is the new voice of American politics and spokesperson for the Gravy Movement - but problems arise when he is given the task of choosing the next Republican nominee

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Reality experiment in which experts select compatible couples from a long list of applicants, then invite them to marry - despite them never having met before

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy pulls out all the stops as she hosts a traditional Victorian Christmas Eve dinner for the friends. Meanwhile, Rajs father comes to visit, and the guys do their best to free a bird they accidentally let into the university clean room. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj endures an anxious day as he worries that a space probe he helped design will not function properly, while Leonard and Sheldon agree to go clothes shopping with Penny and Amy. Comedy, starring Kunal Nayyar, Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The family takes part in a new reality TV show set in the 19th century, which proves unpopular with viewers, prompting the producers to try a series of increasingly desperate and dangerous ploys in a bid to boost ratings. With the guest voice of former boxer Larry Holmes

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer is the target of a mysterious murder attempt at a sauna, so Chief Wiggum orders Sideshow Bobs early release from prison to help identify the culprit. Featuring the guest voice of Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Haunted by questions, John Paul digs into what really happened on the night when Bobby died. Clare wont stop until she gets her money back, and secrets continue to tear a family apart

programme.title: Hollyoaks At 30: Most Explosive Episodes
programme.desc: A look back at a classic episode ahead of the groundbreaking soaps 30th anniversary. A catastrophic accident threatens to destroy lives in the village, while Doug still cant let go of the past

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Guests include a woman whose exes tend to marry someone else soon after the break-up, who is paired with a wedding photographer in search of a picture-perfect love of his own. A divorced grandfather trying to conceal his age connects with a business analyst who has been called unapproachable, while a former youth Olympic trampolinist from Essex fears his ginger hair is holding him back

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: As the newlyweds return from their honeymoons, all nine couples move in together and adjust to life in their marital homes, ahead of the first dinner party

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Jack is still reeling from his break-up with Livvy, who seems to be moving on with her so-called friendship with Kit, and he sets out to confront the pair. When Jazz makes clear her own feelings about Livvys disrespectful behaviour, Livvy isnt impressed - and sparks fly. Armans back from Thailand, and Tabitha wastes no time in messaging him to arrange to meet. Jazz confides in Jules about feeling uncomfortable in her own skin. Shes keen to explore her identity, but fearful of opening up to Demi and jeopardising their relationship. Beks and Ollys Thailand fling left Freddy adamant that Beks was doing it to get revenge

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on April 2021 shows including Line of Duty, Snackmasters, Alan Carrs Epic Gameshow, Mastermind, Baby Surgeons: Delivering Miracles, The Art of the Joy of Sex and Dr Pimple Popper. They also observe BBC news coverage of the apparent spat between Dominic Cummings and Boris Johnson

programme.desc: Sunny is upset by Bens wandering eyes and fears that she might get hurt again and theres major drama when new guests are royally demanding. When Fraser reaches breaking point with Barbie, he asks Captain Kerry to make a crew change

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer becomes a doting father and decides to spend quality time with his youngest daughter when he discovers Santas Little Helper knows Maggie better than he does. Meanwhile, a lonely Moe joins an online dating agency, and gets a pleasant surprise when he meets an attractive woman

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon becomes concerned that his comfortable lifestyle is having an impact on his professional progress and is stopping him from achieving scientific greatness, so he asks the gang to make life more difficult for him. Meanwhile, Howard invents an unflattering game about Raj. Starring Jim Parsons and Simon Helberg

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon are forced to defend themselves against criticism from an online bully after publishing a physics paper. Meanwhile, the girls confront embarrassing moments from their pasts during a night in. Comedy, guest starring Stephen Hawking, with Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: A simple texting error threatens everything when Manny and Luke put on a fancy winter ball at the school, Mitchell gets a wake-up call when he offers to help, while Jays thinly veiled attempt to get out of it by pretending to want to spend time with Phil backfires. Vanessa Bayer guests stars as an overbearing mother

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: While Melvin and Haynes are on the beat, they are almost decoyed away from a robbery. Long-running drama with the bobbies and detectives at Londons Sun Hill police station

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Tosh and Carver carry out an observation on a man who might lead them to an arms dump. Drama with the bobbies and detectives of Sun Hill

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Due to a slight resemblance to a missing woman, Brind reluctantly agrees to perform a reconstruction of her disappearance for television

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Burnside visits Carvers prisoner, and interrogates him alone, against regulations. Drama with the bobbies and detectives of Sun Hill

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: After a burglary at her home, an elderly woman has a fatal heart attack in front of WPC Brind

programme.title: Secret Headquarters
programme.desc: Fourteen-year-old Charlie Kincaid yearns for a deeper connection to his father Jack, who frequently disappears at short notice for work. When an IT conference interrupts Charlies birthday, the teenager invites friends to a party at his fathers house, and they stumble upon a subterranean, gizmo-laden lair. Comedy adventure, starring Owen Wilson, Walker Scobell and Michael Pena

programme.title: Film4 Interview Specials
programme.desc: Stars Tom Cruise, Rebecca Ferguson, Henry Cavill, Simon Pegg, Vanessa Kirby and director Christopher McQuarrie talk about making the sixth instalment in the franchise

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: A woman raises her six-year-old daughter to believe that Santa Claus does not exist, but they both have a change of heart after meeting a department store Father Christmas who claims to be the man himself. When the kindly fellow is accused of being a charlatan, his new friends engage a lawyer to prove his true identity. Remake of the 1947 family drama, with Richard Attenborough, Elizabeth Perkins, Mara Wilson and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: Midway
programme.desc: The story of the Battle of Midway, a clash between the American fleet and the Imperial Japanese Navy, which marked a pivotal turning point in the Pacific Theatre during the Second World War. When US intelligence intercepts messages detailing a Japanese attack on an unnamed location, it becomes a race against time to both figure out where will be hit next and how to prepare for an impending battle. Roland Emmerichs drama, starring Ed Skrein, Patrick Wilson, Woody Harrelson and Luke Evans

programme.title: Hunter Killer
programme.desc: Unconventional submarine skipper Joe Glass is sent to investigate the torpedoing of US and Russian vessels. He winds up trying to rescue the Russian president, who has been kidnapped by a rogue general. Action thriller, starring Gerard Butler, Gary Oldman and Common

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team join forces with CIA assassin August Walker to prevent a disaster caused by mysterious arms dealer John Lark and a group of terrorists known as the Apostles. However, Hunt and his colleagues are soon pushed to their limits thanks to a face from their past. Writer/director Christopher McQuarries sixth entry in the action thriller saga, starring Tom Cruise, Henry Cavill, Ving Rhames, Simon Pegg and Rebecca Ferguson

programme.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
programme.desc: Two friends are thrust into the middle of an international conspiracy when one of them discovers the ex-boyfriend who broke up with her by text message is really a CIA agent on the run from a team of assassins. The revelation sends them on a death-defying journey across Europe with the fate of the world at stake. Comedy, starring Mila Kunis, Kate McKinnon, Sam Heughan and Gillian Anderson

programme.title: Locke
programme.desc: A devoted family man preparing to face the biggest challenge of his career receives a mysterious phone call that leads him to make a fateful decision. However, this act sets in motion a series of events that threaten to destroy his entire life over the course of a single car journey. Thriller, starring Tom Hardy, with the voices of Olivia Colman and Andrew Scott

programme.title: The Swimmer
programme.desc: A world-weary man embarks on a unique odyssey of self-discovery, attempting to reach home by diving into and swimming in the neighbourhood pools along his route. Director Frank Perrys cult drama, starring Burt Lancaster, Kim Hunter and Janice Rule

programme.title: The Man from Colorado
programme.desc: An American Civil War veteran, twisted by his experiences during the conflict, becomes the judge of a small town. He embarks on a reign of terror, ruthlessly misusing his power, and it falls to an old friend from his army days to bring him down. Western, starring Glenn Ford, William Holden, Ellen Drew and Ray Collins

programme.title: Gift Horse
programme.desc: A Navy captain reluctantly takes command of an old US destroyer during the Second World War and struggles with a crew who do not respect his authority. However, the prospect of facing the mighty German force brings much-needed unity. Adventure, starring Trevor Howard, Richard Attenborough, Bernard Lee, Sonny Tufts and James Donald

programme.title: The Desert Fox
programme.desc: German commander Rommel falls out of favour with Hitler following his defeat at El Alamein. On returning to his homeland, he is torn between his oath of loyalty and lack of faith in the Fuehrers unstable leadership, prompting him to become involved in an assassination plot. Second World War drama, starring James Mason, Jessica Tandy, Cedric Hardwicke, Leo G Carroll and Luther Adler

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Two decades have passed since Earth was saved from an extraterrestrial invasion, and in the years since, the aliens salvaged technology has been used to transform the world. However, it may not be enough to save the human race when a second, even deadlier attack begins. Sci-fi adventure, starring Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Bill Pullman

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: The daughter of retired special forces officer John Matrix is kidnapped by an old comrade-in-arms, now in league with a deposed former dictator. The tyrant plans to use the girl to force Matrix into assassinating the head of the country he once ruled, but is unprepared for the lengths to which the veteran soldier will go to rescue his child. Action adventure, with Arnold Schwarzenegger and Rae Dawn Chong

programme.title: Dead Mans Shoes
programme.desc: A man returns to his Derbyshire home town and it soon becomes clear he has a dark purpose for revisiting his old stamping ground, and the local drug dealers have plenty of reason to be nervous. Psychological thriller from director Shane Meadows, starring Paddy Considine, Toby Kebbell, Gary Stretch and Stuart Wolfenden

programme.title: Joyland
programme.desc: While a family patriarch yearns for a grandson, his youngest son is swept into a forbidden romance with a trans starlet in a theatre. Drama, with Ali Junejo, Rasti Farooq and Alina Khan. In Pakistani

programme.title: The High Chaparral
programme.desc: On her way home from a visit to her fathers ranch, Victoria discovers a baby orphaned in an Indian raid

programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama, charting the mission to track down and eliminate the pride of the German fleet, a fearsome battleship devastating British vessels in the North Atlantic, orchestrated by a British naval officer recovering from his wifes death in an air raid. Starring Kenneth More, Dana Wynter, Laurence Naismith and Karel Stepanek

programme.title: The Guns of Fort Petticoat
programme.desc: A lieutenant deserts after his commanding officer launches an unprovoked attack on a Comanche village during the Civil War. Realising that there are no soldiers in his home town to protect it from reprisals, he returns to train the local women to defend themselves. Western, starring Audie Murphy, Kathryn Grant, Hope Emerson and Jeff Donnell

programme.title: The Wild and the Innocent
programme.desc: A naive beaver trapper finds himself with an unwanted travelling companion in the shape of a woman fleeing her family. They leave their mountain home for a nearby town, but find their first taste of city living harder to cope with than expected, especially when they fall foul of a crooked sheriff. Comedy Western, starring Audie Murphy and Sandra Dee

programme.title: Winchester 73
programme.desc: A gunslinger tracks down his fathers killer, but is unable to exact his revenge because the sheriff of the town makes a point of confiscating all firearms. Instead he challenges him to compete in a shooting competition to win a superb rifle, but when the murderer loses, he steals the coveted prize. Western, starring James Stewart, Shelley Winters, Dan Duryea and Stephen McNally

programme.title: Reap the Wild Wind
programme.desc: The owner of a 19th-century salvage company falls in love with a captain she rescues from a shipwreck, and helps him prove in court that the vessels sinking was not his fault. However, the lawyer hired to plead the case also falls for the salvager, and the rivalry drives the captain into an alliance with a ruthless pirate. Romantic adventure, starring John Wayne and Paulette Goddard

programme.title: Maximum Conviction
programme.desc: Two special forces agents are given the task of transporting a pair of female convicts to prison, only to come under attack by a mercenary force sent to kill them. When they discover the true identity of the women in their charge, they realise the situation is even more dangerous than it seems. Action adventure, starring Steven Seagal and Steve Austin

Meanwhile, butler Carson is mortified to be confronted with his past, and housemaid Gwen seems to have a secret correspondent. Costume drama, starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville, Dan Stevens, Penelope Wilton, Elizabeth McGovern, Jim Carter and Rose Leslie

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Coras attempts at matchmaking are dashed when Mary is smitten not by intended target Evelyn Napier, but by his handsome friend, Turkish attache Kemal Pamuk. The couples mutual attraction sparks a train of events whose consequences ripple through the entire household. Gwen is humiliated as her secret ambition is exposed, and Bates takes extreme action to cure his limp. Costume drama, starring Maggie Smith, Michelle Dockery, Brendan Patricks, Theo James, Rose Leslie and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The fair arrives in the village and Mrs Hughes finds herself the centre of speculation when she meets a former suitor who makes her question her position at Downton. Meanwhile, Violet and Isobel lock horns over a medical ailment affecting Molesley, and Carson fears there is a thief at work in the grounds. Costume drama, starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville, Phyllis Logan, Penelope Wilton, Jim Carter and Kevin Doyle

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: As the village prepares for the annual flower show, Isobel finds herself in conflict with Violet, and Mary is introduced to a potential suitor, but it would seem she only has eyes for Matthew. Anna realises who is to blame when a valuable snuff box goes missing, and Mrs Patmore tearfully reveals her fears to Carson that her career may be coming to an end. Meanwhile, OBrien engineers a way for Edith to take revenge on Mary. Drama, starring Maggie Smith and Robert Bathurst

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The members of amateur operatic society the Midsomer Mummers are busy rehearsing for their charity concert when the body of an unknown man is found in their theatre. Barnaby and Winters investigation quickly becomes a race to discover who is desperate to be centre stage. Crime drama, starring Neil Dudgeon and Nick Hendrix, with Kevin Whately, Samantha Spiro and Shobna Gulati

programme.title: Doc Martin

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: The detective is called to the University of Northumberland when Jamie Marshall, a promising young journalism student, falls to his death from the top of a disused faculty building. With no eyewitnesses and no immediate leads, Vera turns to friends and family to glean all she can about Jamie, and to discover who might have wanted him dead. The students innocent facade is revealed to have concealed simmering resentment and anger which he expressed on the internet - and which may have made him some deadly enemies

programme.title: Coldwater
programme.desc: After failing to intervene in a violent incident at a London playpark, John moves his family to the rural Scottish Idyll of Coldwater, where their new neighbours harbour a dangerous secret. Thriller starring Andrew Lincoln and Eve Myles

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Jackie fights for justice on behalf of a trespasser shot on Lord Ashfordlys land, and Greengrass uses his new job as a newspaper columnist to criticise assorted pillars of society. Rural drama, starring Bill Maynard, Fiona Dolman and Rupert Vansittart.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Rosemary manipulates Kate when stepping up her campaign against Perdy. Andy receives his decree nisi, leaving Jo in a celebratory mood - but money worries dampen her spirits.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Paul drives like a madman to meet Liam and spill the beans about his girlfriend moonlighting as an escort girl - but his erratic driving ends in a horrendous car smash.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: As Pauls life hangs in the balance, Carla and Liam keep a tearful vigil at his bedside, while Michelle rushes to the hospital - only to arrive too late.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Sybils determination to pursue her political leanings lands her in great danger when a fight breaks out at an election results meeting. Bates is cleared of suspicion over the stolen wine, but offers his resignation rather than name the culprit. Drama, starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: The GP is left holding the baby after upsetting the new childminder, but luckily Mike agrees to look after James at short notice. Meanwhile, Ruth is roped into taking part in a phone-in programme on Radio Portwenn and unwittingly answers a call from PC Penhale, who wants to know how to make friends in the village

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A handsome new locum wins Maggies heart but soon falls out of favour with the locals when a misdiagnosis results in tragedy. Rural drama, starring Kazia Pelka and Bill Maynard

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Greengrass embarks on yet another new career, this time trying to earn a crust as a racehorse trainer after a suspicious death at a local stables leaves a window of opportunity. Meanwhile, former copper Blaketons well-honed instincts alert him to council corruption. Nostalgic rural drama, starring Bill Maynard, Derek Fowlds and Jason Durr

programme.title: Foyles War
programme.desc: First episode of the drama, starring Michael Kitchen as a jaded police superintendent who would rather be fighting the enemy in France than crime on the south coast as the Second World War gathers pace in 1940. However, when a local magistrates German wife is murdered amid a growing cloud of uncertainty and anti-Nazi feeling, the ensuing investigation is anything but routine. Edward Fox, Robert Hardy, David Horovitch, Anthony Howell and Honeysuckle Weeks co-star

programme.title: Foyles War
programme.desc: It is July 1945 and, as Britain settles into peacetime, Foyle looks forward to retirement, but finds his life in turmoil once more when Samanthas employer Sir Leonard Spencer-Jones is found dead. Suspicion falls on Niko, a Russian PoW, who flees the Sussex coast and heads for a sanctuary in London - closely followed by Foyle, who has been sent to track him down by the War Office. But the investigation soon brings to light a conspiracy and an international cover-up which, if exposed, could bring down the British government. Max Brown joins the cast, with Michael Kitchen, Honeysuckle Weeks, Anthony Howell, Eleanor Bron and Christopher Good

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Part one of two. Thrillers based on the novels by Val McDermid, starring Robson Green as eccentric clinical psychologist Dr Tony Hill. In the first tale, he is recruited by DI Carol Jordan to help track down a serial killer preying on men in the northern town of Bradfield, but his methods fail to win much support among the other officers on the case. With Hermione Norris and Philip Whitchurch

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Part two of two. Clinical psychologist Dr Tony Hill continues his hunt for the serial killer preying on men in the northern town of Bradfield, but finds his efforts hampered by the local polices scorn for his unconventional methods. With only DI Carol Jordan prepared to believe in him, Tony must draw on all his reserves of strength and insight to bring the case to a shocking conclusion. Thriller, starring Robson Green and Hermione Norris

Kirstie needs to act fast to find them a place which has the potential to become more than just a starter home. Two properties catch their eyes, so they have to be quick in deciding which suits them best; and Kirstie has to be even quicker to try to secure one. Meanwhile, Phils search for space is even more pressing - hes with a family-of-five who are sleeping between two bedrooms in a home thats bursting at the seams. Suki, Kuli, and their three young daughters are currently squashed into a three-bedroom house, and with home worker Kuli using one bedroom as a home office, the pressures on Phil to find them a bigger house. It must be roomy enough to host family and friends, have good outside space, and not be too far from where they currently live. Its a tight brief, but Phil manages to find a contender. programme.desc: The wise-cracking blue hedgehog, made famous by a series of popular video games on Sega consoles, continues his computer-animated adventures through the Shatterverse. At the end of the first series, the eponymous spiny mammal (voiced by Deven Mack) learnt from black hedgehog Shadow (Ian Hanlin) that the original version of Green Hill no longer exists. Sonic is trapped in a multiverse of mayhem with different iterations of his friends Amy Rose (Shannon Chan-Kent), Knuckles (Adam Nurada), Rouge (Kazumi Evans) and Tails (Ashleigh Ball). On another branch of the family tree, Ralf is thrilled to confirm a family rumour that he is linked to a Welsh international footballer - his great grandfather. programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Comedian, presenter and actor Matt Lucas had an exceptionally close bond with his late grandmother, Margot, who came to the UK in 1939 as a Jewish refugee from Nazi Germany. Matt has never fully understood what Margot experienced as a young woman in Berlin in the lead up to the Second World War - or what became of the extended family she left behind. Matts poignant journey takes him to Berlin, and then to Amsterdam where he discovers an extraordinary connection to Anne Frank, as well as the fate of his many family members who had fled to Holland, which was later was invaded by the Germans
