programme.title: 10 Things to Know About
programme.desc: Kathriona Devereux and Jonathan McCrea explore ways to decarbonise heating, from public buildings to private homes. They look at how district heating systems can be combined with heat pump technology to reduce Irelands reliance on fossil fuels and reduce costs. They also meet researchers who discuss the geology behind geothermal energy, highlight projects investigating potential sources around Ireland - including a few surprising locations that have been using geothermal for decades - and discuss how heat from the Earth could form a crucial part of Irelands supply-and-demand heating network

programme.title: Casualty
programme.desc: Jodie looks back on her days as a student midwife five years previously, when her mother chose to stop her chemotherapy treatment. She receives word that her mothers health has deteriorated just as she is preparing to deliver a baby, and is faced with an impossible choice between her family and the needs of her patient

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: Murder proves to be no laughing matter when Father Brown visits a jesters convention. Whodunit, starring Mark Williams as the sleuthing priest, with Neil Pearson and Paul Copley

programme.title: Foram
programme.desc: Caoimhe Ní Laighin hosts current affairs debate on national and international stories, with reports from Darragh Ó Caoimh

programme.title: Mass
programme.desc: Service of worship

programme.title: Yom Kippur: A Time To Reflect
programme.desc: A programme dedicated to the Day of Atonement, one of the holiest days in the Jewish calendar, hearing reflections from the Irish Jewish community, alongside their repentances and self-examination of the past year

programme.title: The Week in Politics
programme.desc: Reflections on the political week, including contributions from journalists, senators and TDs. Hosted by Áine Lawlor

programme.title: RTÉ News: One OClock and Weather
Nevens Ulster Food Tour
programme.desc: Neven Maguire visits Glenarm Castle in Ballymena where he wanders around the gardens with estate manager Adrian Morrow, and also sees their famous shorthorn beef cows. He also takes a trip to Morellis ice cream shop in Portrush, where he samples some of their award winning flavours. Nevens own recipe is vanilla and hazelnut no-churn ice cream with poached pears and chocolate sauce

programme.title: Seisiún
programme.desc: Renowned singer and presenter Muireann Nic Amhlaoibh introduces performances from the Roisin Dubh in the heart of Galway City. Musicians flock to celebrate Campbells Tavern, including band Bell X1 who return to a musical home to pay homage to one of their favourite venues. Sharon Shannon joins for a flavour of traditional music, along with Mary Coughlan who describes the Rosin as her spiritual stage

programme.title: Tracks and Trails
programme.desc: Former Wexford Camogie player and RTÉ analyst Ursula Jacob sets out on a trail in Tralee, along the old ships canal. For her second walk, she heads south towards Derrynane to settle in for a hike, which takes in sections of 3 routes, an Old Butter route, The Kerry Way and The Mass Loop

programme.title: Nerves of Steel
programme.desc: Filmed over two years in Emerald Park, this behind-the-scenes documentary follows the trials and tribulations of building Europes longest intertwining rollercoasters

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small
programme.desc: Siegfried has the bright idea of bringing in an experienced bookkeeper, Miss Harbottle, to bring method to the madness of the practice. Shes certainly efficient, but the cracks soon start to show - and a sick ferret only makes matters worse. Farmer Dakin is very attached to his injured, elderly cow, but Siegfried advises letting the animal go, while James and Helen arrive at a long-awaited decision

programme.title: The Money List
programme.desc: Champions Yvonne from Kildare and Cathal from Cork take on new challengers Ross from Dublin and Jayde from Tipperary for the chance to win 15,000 euros. The winning contestants go on to face Jack from Roscommon and Marian from Tipperary. Baz Ashmawy presents

programme.title: Showkids
programme.desc: Grampa Charley discovers Sams brother Ollie is changing school grades for cash, and guilts him into changing Sams too. When Principal Close discovers the crime, he suspects Sam, due to his rebellious new persona. Sam is about to find out why method acting is so dangerous

programme.title: Nuacht

programme.title: Monarch of the Glen

programme.desc: Gordon Buchanan completes his equatorial journey in Southeast Asia. He reveals evidence that Indonesias capital, Jakarta, is sinking, and discovers how drones are helping to manage a dangerous conflict between elephants and farmers in Sumatra. In areas of Borneo afflicted by deforestation, he searches for orangutans at night, and helps the veterinarian team health-check orphaned apes at the rehabilitation centre in Sepilok, Malaysia. Finally, he finds out how aerial tech offers hope for endangered Siamese crocodiles

programme.title: Inside Art

programme.title: The Art of the Garden

Starting at the Necropolis, he travels to the worlds oldest music hall before enjoying the views from a city-centre landmark. He also finds the time to take tea with a film star

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: The actor returns to explore more of the worlds most luxurious hotels and begins in Miamis South Beach, home to some of the most hedonistic and extravagant establishments in America. At the Fontainebleau, he meets a man with eye-opening stories about Frank Sinatras regular visits and gets a shock when he discovers how much it costs to hire a booth in the night club. Richard also gatecrashes swimwear fashion week at the Raleigh Hotel, where he speaks to the event manager about the many celebrity parties he has organised

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: In this edition the actor explores the luxury hotels of Hong Kong. Home to more skyscrapers than any other city, he first checks in to the Mandarin in the financial district, before experiencing the Four Seasons, the only hotel with two Michelin three-star resturants, as well as the timeless Peninsula in Kowloon, which even provides a Rolls-Royce airport taxi service. He ends his stay at the Ritz-Carlton, home to the worlds highest swimming pool

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Origin story of the famed criminal defence lawyer, starring Matthew Rhys. In 1931 Los Angeles, Perry investigates a child kidnapping gone wrong

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Sister Alice impulsively offers the Dodsons the churchs moral and financial support. A shocking admission from Baggerly meets Masons wrath. Starring Matthew Rhys

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Maynard Barnes goes public with a shocking new development, and gains unauthorised access to some evidence. Later, he tries to extract information from Drake

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Mason and Strickland lean on Virgil for legal assistance. Birdy urges Sister Alice to renounce her claims about baby Charlie

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The seven kingdoms of Westeros prepare for all-out war as newly crowned King in the North Robb Stark marches south to avenge his father. Tyrion Lannister arrives in Kings Landing to curb the excesses of teenage tyrant Joffrey, and Stannis Baratheon, brother of the late King Robert, sets his sights on the Iron Throne. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire novels, starring Stephen Dillane, Richard Madden, Peter Dinklage and Jack Gleeson

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion turns his anger on Cersei for alienating Joffreys subjects in the wake of the capitals bloody purge, and Theon returns to the Iron Islands for first time in nine years, where he discovers his father Balon is planning to rebel against the crown once again. Arya shares a secret with her new friend Gendry while travelling north to the Wall, and Davos Seaworth recruits an ally who may prove useful in Stannis Baratheons naval invasion of Kings Landing

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: What Is Dead May Never Die
programme.desc: Tyrion strengthens his position as Hand of the King with a risky gambit devised to identify the member of the small council in league with his sister Cersei, while at Winterfell, Maester Luwin tries to help Bran make sense of his dreams. Catelyn travels to the Stormlands to foster an alliance with the Baratheons, but King Renly, his new wife Margaery Tyrell and her brother Ser Loras have other plans. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Robb Starks chain of victories against the Lannisters enrages Joffrey, who punishes Sansa for her brothers successes. Tyrion struggles to find a way to curb his nephews cruel excesses and enlists Cerseis lover Lancel as an informant. Catelyn urges the Baratheon brothers to forgo their ambitions and unite against a common enemy, while across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys and her exhausted retinue arrive at the walled city of Qarth

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Catelyn is forced to flee when the Baratheon brothers rivalry comes to a bloody end, and Lord Baelish spots an opportunity to further his own ambitions. Tyrion discovers Joffrey is planning to use a secret weapon to defend his seat of power, and Theon sails for the Stony Shore to prove his worth as a Greyjoy. Arya receives a favour from the man she freed from Harrenhal, and the Nights Watch arrives at the Fist of the First Men to stem the advance of the wildling army

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Old Gods and the New
programme.desc: King Joffreys tyrannical rule prompts the people of Kings Landing to riot, with near devastating consequences for Sansa. Meanwhile, beyond the Wall, Qhorin gives Jon a chance to prove himself. and across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys resolve strengthens as she vows to reclaim what she believes is rightfully hers. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Theons determination to prove his Ironborn status prompts him to embark on a hunt. Daenerys receives an invitation that could prove useful to her cause, and Jaime Lannisters fortunes appear to change after a meeting with a relative among Robb Starks captives. Fantasy drama, starring Alfie Allen, Emilia Clarke and Nikolaj Coster-Waldau

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: As Robbie and Cliff try to find a potential buyer, Tom and Grasso level with the Dark Hearts, and Aleah and Lizzie question Peaches former co-workers. Later, a raid leads Tom to a shocking revelation

programme.title: The Last of Us

programme.title: The Last of Us

programme.title: Task

programme.title: Succession

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Paul talks to Jake and Amy in a bid to discover why their relationship is so fickle

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Fish merchant Robert and his wife Kelly decide to open a seafood restaurant in Brixham - but their determinedly contemporary approach to cuisine leaves some locals unimpressed. The programme also follows the journey of a turbot over 36 hours, as it is caught and auctioned off before being served in an exclusive London restaurant

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming heads across the Irish Sea to Dublin, where he succumbs to the citys famous charm and meets some of its most fascinating characters. On a journey that takes in an 18th-century pleasure house and a burlesque life-painting class, Alan also stops off in Temple Bar for a pint with singer Sharon Corr, unlocks a mystery in Irelands oldest library and uncovers a stylish secret that lurks behind the steel shutters of an old lock-up

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: The actor heads to Tokyo and checks out the Park Hyatt, the hotel featured in the film Lost in Translation, and goes behind the closed doors of the Japanese capitals love hotels. In the fashionable district of Meguro, Richard takes in the Claska, which was the citys first boutique hotel and has its own canine beauty salon

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: The Commodore exploits his connections within the Coast Guard to throttle Atlantic Citys liquor supply - so Nucky responds by calling in a favour from Washingtons new attorney general, Harry Daugherty. Irish republican Owen Sleater sets about proving his worth by intercepting a delivery, but his actions put more pressure on Lolly Steinman. Meanwhile, Margaret reveals her secret to the household staff, and Lucy struggles to cope with her loneliness

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Jimmy and Mickey find themselves with a surplus of liquor and decide to take advantage by expanding their operations into new territories. Nucky discovers his lawyer may have found a way to fend off the corruption charges, Eli fears the Commodores leadership abilities are on the wane, Chalky comes under pressure at home and at work, and Owen decides to demonstrate his expertise. Drama, starring Steve Buscemi and Michael Shannon

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: The lawyer helps a young heiress in the matter of her fathers estate, but the case is complicated when a murderer strikes immediately after Mason learns a blackmailer has contacted his client

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: As Emilys trial begins, Mason tries to overcome his shaky start. Della and Strickland search for a connection between Ennis and Charlies kidnappers. Starring Matthew Rhys

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion is sent out to welcome a royal party from Dorne outside the walls of Kings Landing, and Jon Snow finds himself on trial at Castle Black over his time with the wildlings and the death of Qhorin Halfhand. Daenerys heads toward the slave city of Meereen, and Arya runs into a familiar face. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Emilia Clarke and Kit Harington

programme.title: Das Boot
programme.desc: Schulz arrives and claims that Lessing is the head of the Navy conspiracy and its up to Hannie to save the day by coming up with a good story. In German

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky decides to tell his enemies what they want to hear - before springing a surprise at a Memorial Day service. Eli questions his allegiances as his options start to dwindle, Jimmy is taught a painful lesson by one of the Commodores associates and Richard Harrow goes hunting in the forest

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky orchestrates a risky liquor delivery in Philadelphia - but in Atlantic City, attorney general Daugherty encounters a problem that could complicate the electoral fraud investigation. Leander Whitlock, the Commodores lawyer, takes Jimmy under his wing, while Van Alden is plagued by his conscience as Lucy struggles to live in solitude

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Part one of two. A sniper strikes terror into the hearts of the residents of Baltimore. Gritty police drama, guest starring chat show host Jay Leno

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Part two of two. The officers continue their investigation into the sniper attacks and a copycat killer emerges. Gritty police drama, guest starring chat show host Jay Leno

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Laws of Gods and Men
programme.desc: Stannis and Davos arrive in Braavos for their meeting with the Iron Bank, but find Tycho Nestoris (Mark Gatiss) a hard man to do business with. Yara Greyjoy leads a band of Ironborn on a mission to rescue her brother Theon, while Daenerys meets with supplicants in Meereen. In Kings Landing, Tyrions trial begins in the throne room and he is stunned by the identity of one of the crowns witnesses. Fantasy drama, starring Stephen Dillane and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion enlists an unlikely ally, while Daario entreats Daenerys to allow him to do what he does best. Jons warnings about the Walls vulnerability fall on deaf ears, while Brienne and Pod follow a new lead as they continues their mission to track down the Stark girls. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: In the midst of preparing for a key operation, Tom questions the loyalty of the members of his task force, while Robbie and Cliff plan for their meeting at the park. Perry searches for answers within the gang and uncovers a shocking truth and Maeve casts doubt on Robbies exit plan

programme.title: Mare of Easttown
programme.desc: Colin presses a local priest about the vague circumstances that prompted his transfer to the parish. Later, an anonymous call gives Dawn hope that Katie might still be alive

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tonys affair with Gloria turns violent, Jackie Jr tries to follow in Ralphs footsteps by proving himself as a hardcore criminal and Carmela makes an unusual confession to her priest. Drama, starring James Gandolfini

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: Avon and rival drug trafficker Proposition Joe hold an Eastside versus Westside basketball game, giving the detectives the first glimpse of their elusive target. Freamon shows Prez and Sydnor how to trace the Barksdale finances and Herc and Carver misplace money they take from Wee-Bey. Omar continues looking for a way to get to Avon and makes a deal with Joe

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: A recently paroled master jewel thief makes his way to Banshee, Pennsylvania, to hook up with his former partner-in-crime and lover, only to find she has changed her name and made a new life for herself - complete with defence attorney husband and two children. When the towns incoming sheriff is killed, the opportunistic former jailbird adds identity theft to his list of crimes and takes on the mans identity and his job. Pilot episode of the drama, starring Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic and Ben Cross

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrions fate is decided as his champion Oberyn Martell faces against Gregor the Mountain Clegane in his trial by combat, while Moles Town is on the receiving end of a raid by the wildlings. Ramsay sends Theon into Moat Cailin to negotiate the surrender of the Ironborn troops holding the fort, Littlefinger and Sansa are questioned about the circumstances surrounding Lysas death and Barristan confronts Jorah about a document delivered to him. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage and Pedro Pascal

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The men of the Nights Watch face their biggest challenge yet as they prepare to defend the Wall and Castle Black against attacks from the north and south by Mance Rayders wildling army, with Ygritte determined to be the one to kill Jon Snow. Sam gets some sage advice about love from Maester Aemon and is shocked when someone comes knocking at the gates seeking shelter. Fantasy drama, starring Kit Harington and directed by Neil Marshall, the man behind the second series episode depicting the Battle of the Blackwater

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: The cameras follow three teams of fishermen participating in Brixhams annual Trawler Race, including a father and son who have been pitted against each other. Landlady Pat Seddon is not looking forward to the raucous celebrations, however, and decides to reminisce about past race days instead. The programme also meets Matt Kimble, a graduate who gave up on his plan to become a PE teacher and decided to follow his ancestors into the fishing trade instead

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: Anxious family man Gil Buckman is determined to have a better relationship with his three children than he had with his tough father. Elsewhere, his two sisters are also having family problems - one is struggling to understand her two troubled teenagers, while the others husband wants to turn their toddler into a child genius. Comedy drama, starring Steve Martin, Keanu Reeves, Mary Steenburgen, Jason Robards and Dianne Wiest

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: A baseball player is stunned to learn he has come into a massive inheritance. Unfortunately, there is one condition - he must somehow find a way to spend $30million in just one month, or he will lose the lot. Meanwhile, two scheming lawyers, who stand to get the money if he fails, are determined to sabotage his efforts. Comedy, starring Richard Pryor, John Candy, Lonette McKee and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Thirtysomething slacker Dupree finds himself out of a job with nowhere to live, and turns to his newly married best friend Carl for a place to stay. But Carl comes to regret his act of hospitality as the layabout shows no sign of ever moving out - not to mention his annoyance when his new wife takes a liking to their laid-back guest. Comedy, starring Owen Wilson, Matt Dillon, Kate Hudson and Michael Douglas.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having settled their differences, Brad and Dustys newfound friendship is put to the test when their respective fathers - one gentle, the other overly macho - arrive for the Christmas holidays, forcing them to change their plans. What starts as a break at a fun-filled trip to a luxury resort turns into something far more chaotic. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Mel Gibson and John Lithgow

programme.title: Mr Deeds
programme.desc: A naive pizza parlour owner inherits $40billion and moves to New York, where he encounters unscrupulous opportunists keen to get their hands on the money - and a ruthless reporter determined to tell his story. Remake of 1936 romantic comedy Mr Deeds Goes to Town, with Adam Sandler, Winona Ryder, John Turturro, Allen Covert, Peter Gallagher and Jared Harris

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: A family tragedy woos Delia Deetz, daughter Lydia and rebellious teenage granddaughter Astrid back to the close-knit community of Winter River. Astrid accidentally opens a portal to the afterlife by summoning Beetlejuice three times. The mischievous demon ricochets between realms, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. Tim Burtons comedy sequel, starring Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder and Jenna Ortega

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Aliens declare war on Earth having seen video games from the 1980s and interpreted them as a threat. Their attack comes in the form of deadly recreations of classic video games, so the US government recruits four former arcade champions to repel the attack. Sci-fi comedy, starring Adam Sandler and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancees latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller

programme.title: The Book of Clarence
programme.desc: In AD 33 Jerusalem, non-believer Clarence hatches a scheme to pose as a messiah as he approaches the 30-day deadline imposed by sadistic loan shark Jedediah the Terrible. News spreads of Clarences powers of healing, which may spare him Jedediahs blade, but condemn him to crucifixion at the hands of a preening Pontius Pilate. Comedy, starring LaKeith Stanfield, Omar Sy, RJ Cyler, Eric Kofi-Abrefa and James McAvoy

programme.title: The Cinema List: SNL
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, the Cinema List explores 50 years of films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Borat Subsequent Moviefilm
programme.desc: Borat returns from Kazakhstan to America intent on giving his fifteen year old daughter to the vice president. While on his mission, Borat also learns more about the American culture, the COVID-19 pandemic and political elections. Spoof documentary sequel, starring Sacha Baron Cohen

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Barton Academy boarding school teacher Paul Hunham incurs the wrath of headmaster Dr Hardy Woodrup by failing the son of a powerful senator. As punishment, Woodrup selects Paul to remain on campus over Christmas to chaperone the boys who wont be travelling home for the holidays. Alexander Paynes comedy drama, starring Paul Giamatti, DaVine Joy Randolph and Dominic Sessa

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: The Accidental Husband
programme.desc: Radio talk-show host Dr Emma Lloyd advises a caller to her show to leave her boyfriend - who gets even by falsifying civil records to make it seem he and Emma are legally married, even though they have never met. This presents Emma with a big problem, as she is currently planning her wedding. Romantic comedy, starring Uma Thurman, Colin Firth and Jeffrey Dean Morgan

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having settled their differences, Brad and Dustys newfound friendship is put to the test when their respective fathers - one gentle, the other overly macho - arrive for the Christmas holidays, forcing them to change their plans. What starts as a break at a fun-filled trip to a luxury resort turns into something far more chaotic. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Mel Gibson and John Lithgow

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: A family tragedy woos Delia Deetz, daughter Lydia and rebellious teenage granddaughter Astrid back to the close-knit community of Winter River. Astrid accidentally opens a portal to the afterlife by summoning Beetlejuice three times. The mischievous demon ricochets between realms, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. Tim Burtons comedy sequel, starring Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder and Jenna Ortega

programme.title: The Death of Stalin
programme.desc: The place is Moscow, the year is 1953 and after being in power for nearly 30 years, Soviet dictator Joseph Stalin dies after an inconveniently brief illness. Amid the shock, the members of the Council of Ministers engage in a chaotic bid for power. Armando Iannuccis political satire, starring Andrea Riseborough, Jason Isaacs, Rupert Friend, Simon Russell Beale, Steve Buscemi, Jeffrey Tambor and Michael Palin

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: An immature 32-year-old is heartbroken when his girlfriend walks out on him. In a plan to win her back, he volunteers to look after his flatmates five-year-old son, thus demonstrating he is finally ready to grow up. However, his ideas of childcare prove unconventional and chaos quickly ensues. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart, Josh Mostel, Leslie Mann, Rob Schneider and Kristy Swanson, alongside Steve Buscemi in a cameo role

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When New York University professor Rachel Chu heads to Singapore with her boyfriend, Nick Young, shes surprised to learn hes from an extremely wealthy family. The problem is they arent so approving of her, so she attempts to win them over. Blockbusting comedy based on Kevin Kwans novel, starring Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan and Michelle Yeoh

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs the World
programme.desc: A directionless bassist meets the girl of his dreams, but finds that romancing her comes with a dangerous catch. She has seven evil ex-lovers, all endowed with tremendous fighting skills or superpowers - and before he can go out with her, he is expected to face each one in a battle to the death. Comedy adventure, starring Michael Cera, Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Jason Schwartzman

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: A washed-up quarterback ends up in jail after a drunken night out, and is ordered by the warden to put together an American football team to take on the guards, with the help of a former college champ. Remake of 1974 comedy The Mean Machine, with Adam Sandler, Chris Rock, Nelly and Burt Reynolds, who starred in the original

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The sewer-dwelling heroes discover their arch enemy Shredder has returned from another dimension, and made a deal with an alien warlord. Assisted by two mutant henchman, Shredder goes in search of a lost device that will allow his new ally to mount an invasion of Earth. Action adventure sequel, starring Megan Fox, Will Arnett and Stephen Amell

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: An evil queen learns that her reign will last for ever if she kills a princess, so sends a renowned warrior to find and murder her. However, he comes to realise his mistresss evil ways, and instead trains his intended victim to fight so they can bring the tyrants rule to an end. Fantasy adventure, with Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth and Charlize Theron

programme.title: IF
programme.desc: A young girl called named Bea goes through a difficult time with her father and suddenly gains the ability to see imaginary friends (IFs). Bea learns her upstairs neighbour Cal also possesses the same power and they join forces to matchmake IFs with new children. Fantasy adventure, starring Ryan Reynolds and Cailey Fleming, with John Krasinski, who also wrote and directed

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: A man who has been trapped inside a mysterious jungle board game for 26 years is eventually freed when two children start to play it. Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: A reporter discovers four humanoid amphibians who live in the sewers of New York, and use their martial arts skills to fight crime. She helps them as they face their toughest challenge yet - defeating a sinister criminal organisation that seems to have power over the entire city. Fantasy adventure, starring Megan Fox and William Fichtner, with the voice of Johnny Knoxville

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent becomes Britains leading spy following the assassination of all the countrys other espionage experts. Single-handedly he sets out to unmask a mysterious villain responsible for stealing the Crown Jewels - but no one is prepared to believe a sinister billionaire is the culprit. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, John Malkovich, Natalie Imbruglia and Ben Miller

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent retires to a Tibetan monastery in disgrace after a mission goes wrong. He is lured out of seclusion by the chance to redeem himself when his former bosses seek his help in foiling an attempt to assassinate the premier of China. Spy comedy sequel, starring Rowan Atkinson, Gillian Anderson, Rosamund Pike and Dominic West

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Young courting couples Fred and Wilma, and Barney and Betty are invited to stay at a luxury casino in the Stone Age gambling capital. Owner Chip Rockefeller is bent on stopping Fred proposing to wealthy Wilma, because he wants to marry her himself for the money and settle his debts. Family comedy prequel, with Mark Addy, Stephen Baldwin, Joan Collins, Alan Cumming, Kristen Johnston and Jane Krakowski

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A childrens football team competes in a world championship, but one member is left off the field to look after the canine mascot. When an evil plot emerges to sabotage the tournament, the quick-witted dog assembles the other mascots into a team to foil the villains responsible. Family adventure, starring Matthew James Roberts and Kristin Carey, with the voice of Rob Schneider

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: Two Second World War evacuees face a dilemma when they meet a German pilot who has been shot down. Family drama, starring John Bardon and Stacey Tendeter

programme.title: Jackie Chans The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A bumbling chauffeur steps in to take the place of a secret agent injured in an explosion. Wearing the agents hi-tech suit, and with the help of a rookie spy, the humble driver now has all the power he needs to stop a villain from gaining global domination by polluting the worlds water supply. Comedy adventure, starring Jackie Chan, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Jason Isaacs and Richie Coster

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller

Fantasy adventure, starring Megan Fox and William Fichtner, with the voice of Johnny Knoxville

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A 14-year-old with a reputation for tall tales loses the sole copy of a story he has written for school - only for it to end up in the hands of a Hollywood producer. When the youngster realises it has been made into a blockbuster movie, he goes to Los Angeles with his best friend to claim a fair share of the profits - but when the movie executive refuses to do the right thing, they plan a fitting revenge. Comedy, with Frankie Muniz, Paul Giamatti and Amanda Bynes

programme.title: Johnny English

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Pan, who has finally grown up and is now a married lawyer with a family of his own, is whisked away by Tinkerbell to Neverland, where he must learn to fly again if he is to save his children from the clutches of Captain Hook. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Childrens adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: DArtagnan faces a race against time to rescue his kidnapped sweetheart, the queens seamstress and confidante Constance. The young womans survival may rest with Milady, compelling DArtagnan to forge an uneasy alliance with his former enemy. Meanwhile, King Louis XIII faces the prospect of civil war, fuelled by conspirators within his royal court. Swashbuckling sequel, starring François Civil, Eva Green and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: The bumbling security guard is invited to attend a conference in Las Vegas, and brings his teenage daughter along for a family holiday before she leaves for college. However, he is forced to leap into action when he uncovers a gang of criminals are plotting a casino heist. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Raini Rodriguez

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2: The Runaway
programme.desc: Thomas and Bea are now married and living with Peter and his rabbit family. Bored of life in the garden, Peter goes to the big city, where he meets shady characters and ends up creating chaos for the whole family. Adventure sequel, starring Rose Byrne and Domhnall Gleeson, with the voices of James Corden and Margot Robbie

programme.title: Antz
programme.desc: A neurotic worker ant passes himself off as a soldier to impress a princess. However, he provokes a jealously ambitious general with an accidental act of heroism - so he and his beloved decide to flee the brutal colony and go in search of the promised land of Insectopia. Animated comedy, with the voices of Woody Allen, Sharon Stone, Gene Hackman and Sylvester Stallone

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: The blue hedgehog, Knuckles and Tails reunite to face the might of the villainous Shadow, who possesses powers unlike anything they have seen before. Outmuscled on every front, Sonic seeks help from an unlikely source, Dr Ivo Robotnik. Fantasy adventure sequel based on the videogame, starring Jim Carrey, James Marsden and Tika Sumpter

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A teenager from Boston moves to a small conservative town, and discovers the council and a preacher have enforced a ban on loud music and dancing. He openly defies the harsh rules, revitalising the local youth and winning the heart of the reverends daughter. Remake of the 1984 drama, with Kenny Wormald, Julianne Hough and Dennis Quaid

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Environmental activists hijack an energy companys gala in Canary Wharf and take 300 hostages and an ex-soldier now working as a window cleaner tries to rescue them. Action thriller, starring Daisy Ridley. Action thriller, starring Daisy Ridley and Clive Owen

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride Or Die
programme.desc: Fugitives from the law they swore to protect, Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett run a gauntlet of duplicitous police officers and gun-toting criminals in an attempt to clear their late captains name. Fourth chapter in the action adventure franchise, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Vanessa Hudgens and Ioan Gruffudd

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: A drifter in a post-apocalyptic wasteland encounters a crazed, sadistic warlord and his radiation-afflicted cult. He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Reboot of the sci-fi thriller franchise, starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron

programme.title: The Warriors
programme.desc: A New York gang leader calls together all the gangs in the city, with the intention of uniting them. However, when he is assassinated, one of the groups he was hoping to draw into his alliance is framed for the murder, and finds all the others have turned on it. A battle for survival to make it back to their own turf alive ensues. Action adventure, starring Michael Beck and James Remar

programme.title: The Woman in Black
programme.desc: A lawyer tormented by the death of his wife is sent to a remote village to put deceased client Alice Drablows affairs in order. The locals are suspicious of outsiders and determined to keep the areas tragic history a secret, and the late Mrs Drablows isolated house appears to be haunted by a vengeful spirit that seems hell-bent on redressing a decades-past grievance. Horror based on Susan Hills novel, with Daniel Radcliffe and Ciaran Hinds

programme.title: Ferris Buellers Day Off
programme.desc: A teenager plays truant from school and spends the day dragging his girlfriend and a reluctant friend into all manner of crazy adventures in the big city - while the schools dean of students vows to stop at nothing to prove the youngster is faking illness. Comedy, starring Matthew Broderick, Mia Sara, Alan Ruck, Jennifer Grey, Jeffrey Jones and Charlie Sheen

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A teenager recovering from the suicide of a friend persuades a group of her classmates to join her in attempting to make contact with the dead girls spirit. They discover that she was driven to her death by dangerous supernatural forces, which they have unwittingly unleashed to prey on them. Horror, starring Olivia Cooke and Ana Coto

programme.title: Antz
programme.desc: A neurotic worker ant passes himself off as a soldier to impress a princess. However, he provokes a jealously ambitious general with an accidental act of heroism - so he and his beloved decide to flee the brutal colony and go in search of the promised land of Insectopia. Animated comedy, with the voices of Woody Allen, Sharon Stone, Gene Hackman and Sylvester Stallone

Comedy adventure, starring Jackie Chan, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Jason Isaacs and Richie Coster

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When New York University professor Rachel Chu heads to Singapore with her boyfriend, Nick Young, shes surprised to learn hes from an extremely wealthy family. The problem is they arent so approving of her, so she attempts to win them over. Blockbusting comedy based on Kevin Kwans novel, starring Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan and Michelle Yeoh

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: Scientists create a futuristic police state, but political assassinations and corruption provoke an acrobatic rebel agent to seek revenge on those in charge. Sci-fi martial arts thriller, based on the animated series, with Charlize Theron, Marton Csokas, Frances McDormand, Jonny Lee Miller and Sophie Okonedo

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: A drifter in a post-apocalyptic wasteland encounters a crazed, sadistic warlord and his radiation-afflicted cult. He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Reboot of the sci-fi thriller franchise, starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: Three private investigators are recruited to rescue a computer genius from the clutches of a rival. They discover there is more at stake than they thought, as the captive genius has created a dangerous piece of software that must not fall into the wrong hands. Action adventure, based on the TV series, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu and Bill Murray

programme.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The high-kicking trio return, this time to hunt down the villains responsible for stealing two encoded rings containing top-secret information. The case brings them into conflict with a former Angel gone bad, a spurned ex-lover out for revenge and their creepy old enemy the Thin Man. Action adventure sequel, starring Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz and Lucy Liu, with Demi Moore, John Cleese and Bernie Mac

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtiss romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A man is forced to witness the murder of his wife and daughter, and is driven to despair when one of the perpetrators walks free at trial. Years later, he begins a campaign of vigilante violence, seeking revenge on the killers and the justice system that failed to punish them, particularly an assistant district attorney who allowed the defendant to make a deal during the court proceedings. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: An ancient Egyptian god is driven into exile when his evil brother murders their father and seizes his throne. He enlists the aid of a human thief in restoring justice, and in return offers to help the mortal to bring his murdered lover back to life. Fantasy adventure, starring Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Brenton Thwaites, Gerard Butler and Chadwick Boseman

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Death takes over the body of a recently deceased young man, and embarks on a mission to claim the life of a powerful media tycoon, but ends up falling in love with his daughter instead - leaving him on the horns of a dilemma. Remake of 1934 romantic fantasy Death Takes a Holiday, starring Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins and Claire Forlani

programme.title: Juliet and Romeo
programme.desc: Two lovers find themselves central figures in a journey of battles and betrayal. Musical version of the classic tale, starring Clara Rugaard, Jamie Ward, Rebel Wilson and Jason Isaacs

programme.title: Panda Plan
programme.desc: An international action superstar gets involved in a rescue operation of a beloved zoo panda named Hu Hu. Chinese comedy, starring Jackie Chan and Xiang Wei, with subtitles

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the woman of his dreams is kidnapped, a man turns an inability to feel physical pain into an unexpected advantage in his quest to rescue her. Action comedy, starring Jack Quaid, Ray Nicholson and Amber Midthunder

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: In 1838 Germany, Thomas Hutter is sent to the Carpathian mountains to secure the signature of enigmatic nobleman Count Orlok on a property sale in the German city of Wisborg. Thomas leaves his bride Ellen in the care of friend Friedrich Harding and his wife Anna. The young man barely survives the exhausting trip to Europe and stumbles home to find Ellen driven to delirium by a telepathic bond to the Count. Director Robert Eggers version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson

programme.title: Panda Plan
programme.desc: An international action superstar gets involved in a rescue operation of a beloved zoo panda named Hu Hu. Chinese comedy, starring Jackie Chan and Xiang Wei, with subtitles

programme.desc: When the woman of his dreams is kidnapped, a man turns an inability to feel physical pain into an unexpected advantage in his quest to rescue her. Action comedy, starring Jack Quaid, Ray Nicholson and Amber Midthunder

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: After a family barricade themselves inside their remote farmhouse when a creature attacks, a father slowly transforms into something unrecognisable. Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: When a couple flee Europe in 1947, their new lives in the US are changed by a strange client. Director Brady Corbets drama, starring Adrien Brody, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce and Joe Alwyn

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young couple flee the city during a zombie outbreak, only to be involved in a car crash. When the man awakes, his girlfriend is missing, so he bands together with a rugged survivalist to find his partner - but he only has selected memories of what he has been through. Apocalypse drama, starring Carrie-Anne Moss, Douglas Smith, Frank Grillo and Kimberley-Sue Murray

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: An ex-soldier meets a teen fleeing a gang, an encounter which forces them to confront their pasts while navigating present realities. Director Mark OConnors thriller, starring Luke McQuillan, Aidan Gillen and Daniel Fee

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the woman of his dreams is kidnapped, a man turns an inability to feel physical pain into an unexpected advantage in his quest to rescue her. Action comedy, starring Jack Quaid, Ray Nicholson and Amber Midthunder

Director Robert Eggers version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson

programme.title: The Cinema List: Horror Villains
programme.desc: This Halloween, face terror in every form: from the haunted halls of The Shining to the unseen menace of The Invisible Man, this collection delivers horror at its finest

programme.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy is created with one purpose - to love his owner as a parent. When he is rejected by his mother, he is left to roam the bleak landscapes of a futuristic America with a fellow android, searching for a means of becoming a real boy in the hope of regaining her love. Steven Spielbergs sci-fi drama, starring Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, William Hurt and Frances OConnor

programme.title: Lovely, Dark and Deep
programme.desc: A ranger travels alone through the dangerous wilderness, hoping to uncover the origins of a tragedy that has haunted her since she was a child. Writer/director Teresa Sutherlands horror, starring Georgina Campbell and Nick Blood

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In a future blighted by mass infertility, the human race is one generation from extinction and the world has plunged into chaos. In a totalitarian Britain, a jaded former activist tries to protect the first woman to become pregnant in nearly 20 years. However, a militant underground group plans to use her for its own ends. Thriller, starring Clive Owen, Michael Caine and Julianne Moore

programme.title: The Ring 2
programme.desc: Journalist Rachel Keller and her son try to rebuild their shattered lives, moving from Seattle to Oregon and starting afresh. However, the vengeful spirit of Samara follows, and this time she is determined to destroy them. Sequel to the horror remake, starring Naomi Watts, Simon Baker and David Dorfman, and featuring a cameo appearance from Sissy Spacek

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: On holiday in Europe, American couple Ben and Louise Dalton and their anxiety-crippled daughter Agnes meet English doctor Patrick Feld, his wife Ciara and their young son Ant, who was born without a tongue. The Daltons vacation soon turns into a nightmare when they are invited to stay on the Felds country estate. Horror, starring James McAvoy, Mackenzie Davis, Scoot McNairy and Aisling Franciosi

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: A couple previously tormented by paranormal activity discover their nightmares are not over. As more strange events occur, they turn to a group of paranormal investigators for help in uncovering the dark secrets that connect them to the spirit world. Horror sequel, starring Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne and Barbara Hershey

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In a future blighted by mass infertility, the human race is one generation from extinction and the world has plunged into chaos. In a totalitarian Britain, a jaded former activist tries to protect the first woman to become pregnant in nearly 20 years. However, a militant underground group plans to use her for its own ends. Thriller, starring Clive Owen, Michael Caine and Julianne Moore

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Maverick film-maker Carl Denham and his cast and crew board a ship bound for a mysterious island - but when they arrive, a giant gorilla carries off their leading lady, Ann Darrow. As the crew makes its way through the teeming jungle to find her, the director concocts a dangerous scheme to capture the great ape and take it back to New York. Peter Jacksons remake of the fantasy adventure, starring Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody and Andy Serkis, in a dual role as the ships cook and motion-captured creature

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part III
programme.desc: Disfigured mass-murderer Jason Voorhees returns having survived a brutal attack and embarks on another blood-drenched killing spree around Crystal Lake. Horror sequel, starring Dana Kimmell, Paul Kratka, Tracie Savage, Jeffrey Rogers and Richard Brooker

programme.title: Repo Man
programme.desc: A streetwise punk takes a job repossessing vehicles. While a veteran repo man shows him the tricks of the trade, he encounters a UFO conspiracy theorist and gets involved with the hunt for a car with something sinister lurking in the boot. Sci-fi comedy, starring Emilio Estevez, Harry Dean Stanton, Tracey Walter, Fox Harris and Vonetta McGee

programme.title: The Watched
programme.desc: Mina, a 28-year old artist, gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. When Mina finds shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers that are stalked by mysterious creatures each night. Horror, starring Dakota Fanning, Georgina Campbell and Olwen Fouere

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: A disturbed and reclusive butterfly collector decides to extend his collection of exquisite specimens and captures a beautiful art student to add to his menagerie. Thriller, based on John Fowles novel, starring Terence Stamp, Samantha Eggar, Mona Washbourne and Maurice Dallimore

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: On holiday in Europe, American couple Ben and Louise Dalton and their anxiety-crippled daughter Agnes meet English doctor Patrick Feld, his wife Ciara and their young son Ant, who was born without a tongue. Horror sequel, starring Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne and Barbara Hershey

As the crew makes its way through the teeming jungle to find her, the director concocts a dangerous scheme to capture the great ape and take it back to New York. Peter Jacksons remake of the fantasy adventure, starring Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody and Andy Serkis, in a dual role as the ships cook and motion-captured creature

programme.title: The Woman in Black: Angel of Death
programme.desc: A group of evacuees and their teachers hope to find peace by escaping the nightly air raids on London at the remote Eel Marsh House. What they do not realise is that its malevolent ghost is still in residence and is out for blood. Horror sequel set during the Second World War, starring Helen McCrory, Jeremy Irvine and Phoebe Fox

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: An inexperienced military officer is sent to the front line in a war against an alien invasion, and dies within minutes. However, at the point of death, he is transported back in time to relive his last day again. As he faces the same battle over and over again, the experience he gains turns him into the ultimate warrior. Sci-fi adventure based on Hiroshi Sakurazakas novel All You Need Is Kill, starring Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist tests an invisibility serum on himself, but becomes dangerously intoxicated by the power he acquires. He abandons his morals and heads out into the city to take full advantage of his condition. Realising he has been up to no good, concerned colleagues decide to confront him - with terrible consequences. Paul Verhoevens sci-fi thriller, starring Kevin Bacon, Elisabeth Shue, Josh Brolin and Kim Dickens

programme.title: Abigail
programme.desc: Six strangers are recruited to abduct 12-year-old Abigail from her family home and spirit the youngster to a remote location, Wilhelm Manor. They must hold her hostage for 24 hours to earn a huge ransom. However, the cash-hungry sextet are unaware that their captive is a vampire. Horror, starring Melissa Barrera, Dan Stevens, Alisha Weir and Kathryn Newton

programme.title: MaXXXine
programme.desc: In 1980s Hollywood, adult film star and aspiring actress Maxine Minx finally gets her big break. But as a mysterious killer stalks the starlets of Tinseltown, a trail of blood threatens to reveal her sinister past. The third instalment of director Ti Wests acclaimed X film series, starring Mia Goth, Lily Collins, Giancarlo Esposito and Kevin Bacon

programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A sailing trip turns into a nightmare when a woman uncovers the dark past of her mothers new boyfriend. Thriller, starring Odeya Rush, Eric Dane, Saffron Burrows and Ray Liotta in one of his final films

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: Grief-stricken after the loss of her child, a woman takes refuge at a lake house, only to be met with an aberration of herself from a parallel universe. Director Kourosh Aharis thriller, starring Danielle Deadwyler, Aldis Hodge and Edwin Hodge

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: The captain of Russias first nuclear submarine is demoted for expressing fears that the vessel is unfit for commission. However, his anxieties prove well-founded when the reactor malfunctions, creating the possibility of a nuclear explosion the US would mistake for an attack - and potentially triggering a global conflict. Kathryn Bigelows fact-based thriller, starring Harrison Ford, Liam Neeson and Peter Sarsgaard

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: A cynical petty crook is inspired when he sees a freelance camera crew, and decides to go into business filming crime scenes and accidents, then selling the footage to news broadcasters. His determination to stay ahead of the competition leads him down a dark path as his methods become increasingly ruthless. Crime drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rene Russo and Bill Paxton

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A Los Angeles taxi driver picks up a sharp-suited fare and is shocked when a dead body almost plunges through his windscreen during the first stop on the journey. The enigmatic passenger then reveals he is a hitman with four more contracts to carry out before the night is over, and forces the driver to help him. Michael Manns thriller, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowes remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: A serial killer attempts to evade a police blockade while attending a concert with his daughter. Thriller, starring Josh Hartnett, Ariel Donoghue, Saleka Shyamalan and Hayley Mills

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: An idealistic undercover cop in 1960s New York is ostracised by his fellow officers for his refusal to take bribes. Sickened by the widespread corruption in the force and the refusal of his superiors to do anything, he sets out to publicly expose the guilty parties, putting his own life on the line in the process. Fact-based drama directed by Sidney Lumet, starring Al Pacino and John Randolph

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: The captain of Russias first nuclear submarine is demoted for expressing fears that the vessel is unfit for commission. However, his anxieties prove well-founded when the reactor malfunctions, creating the possibility of a nuclear explosion the US would mistake for an attack - and potentially triggering a global conflict. Kathryn Bigelows fact-based thriller, starring Harrison Ford, Liam Neeson and Peter Sarsgaard

programme.desc: Former CIA agent Jack Ryan foils an assassination attempt by an IRA splinter group, killing one of the terrorists in the process. However, he becomes caught in a lethal game of cat-and-mouse with the dead mans revenge-seeking brother. Thriller based on Tom Clancys novel, starring Harrison Ford, Sean Bean, Samuel L Jackson, Richard Harris and James Earl Jones, reprising his role from earlier Clancy adaptation The Hunt for Red October

Action thriller, starring Jason Statham, Jeremy Irons, Minnie Driver and Jemma Redgrave

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns

programme.desc: Alice Roberts visits Canterbury to explore the Plantagenet era, when the powerful house held the throne between 1154 and 1485. She discovers the secrets of the citys cathedral, a centre of ecclesiastical power and also the site of the shocking murder of Thomas Becket. She also discovers the lasting impact of the Black Death and joins a modern-day pilgrimage in medieval garb. Aerial archaeologist Ben Robinson provides a birds-eye view of how the religious institutions of the era still dominate the citys topography

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts explores the story of Stewart Britain by visiting Stirling, the seat of the Scottish royal family for 200 years. She joins a team of archaeologists in uncovering remnants of the docks, explores the secret passageways of Stirling Castle, learns how to make medieval ale, and discovers the origins of football

programme.title: Digging for Britain
programme.sub-title: West - Viking Camp and Iron Age Gold
programme.desc: Alice Roberts visits archaeological digs around the UK, starting with the west of Britain. Finds include the camp from which Vikings invaded Britain and groundbreaking new evidence that the world famous Avebury stone circle isnt just a sacred site, but a place where our ancestors lived and worked

programme.title: Digging for Britain
programme.desc: Alice Roberts visits archaeological digs in the east of the country, unearthing Roman letters that reveal what London was like 2,000 years ago, an East India ship packed with silver, and the first evidence of Caesar in Britain

programme.title: Digging for Britain
programme.desc: Alice Roberts sets off across Hadrians Wall to reveal the forgotten story of the Roman Armys secret weapon in Britain - their cavalry. The programme also follows team of archaeologists and historical re-enactors as they attempt to re-stage a Roman cavalry tournament for a public display in Carlisle

programme.title: Digging for Britain
programme.desc: Alice Roberts shares the best archaeological discoveries of 2018, starting with the North of the UK and a preserved prehistoric village at the black Loch in Myrton. The programme also follows archaeologists uncovering a previously unknown Anglo-Saxon cemetery in Lincolnshire, and a major regeneration project in Salford, unearthing the largest jail in Georgian England. Cameras join the hunt for a lost Second World War reconnaissance Spitfire in Norway and enjoy privileged access to the conservation labs at Vindolanda Roman fort to see what really happens when the digging stops

programme.title: Beyond the Myth: The SS Unveiled
programme.desc: Tasked with guarding concentration camps, this units actions knew no bounds and - despite their heinous acts - still attended social gatherings

programme.title: Beyond the Myth: The SS Unveiled

programme.desc: The myth of the SS has lived on after 1945. Many Nazi perpetrators fled to exile unscathed with the help of the Vatican or the US intelligence services. programme.title: Micro Monsters with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David Attenborough employs the latest technologies to explore the violence, rivalries and deadly weaponry existing within the world of bugs. This first episode examines the survival tactics of its terrifying residents including killer ants, trap-setting spiders and beetles with the ability to shoot boiling chemicals at their enemies

programme.title: Micro Monsters with David Attenborough
programme.desc: The broadcaster continues his bug-eyed view of the world of creepy-crawlies, revealing how predators defuse the defences of their prey. Highlights include the cockroach wasp, busy preparing a tasty - and very live - treat for its young, the whirligig beetle, which employs a water-based radar system, and the jumping portia spider, which feeds on other arachnids

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Rise of Animals
programme.sub-title: From the Seas to the Skies
programme.desc: Part one of two. The naturalist explores the evolution of vertebrates over the past 500 million years, beginning with a look at how remarkable advances allowed primitive fish to make the radical move on to land, and then take to the skies with the advent of flight. He uses fossils of both ancient and living species combined with CGI and film to chart their journey out of the water to populate all corners of the globe

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Rise of Animals
programme.desc: The naturalist concludes his two-part exploration of the evolution of vertebrates over the past 500 million years by looking at the history of mammals. He traces their journey from humble origins as tiny nocturnal forest-dwellers to their astonishing explosion in diversity and domination of the world following the death of the dinosaurs

programme.title: Live Ryder Cup Golf
programme.desc: Coverage of the singles matches on day the third and final day at Bethpage Black in New York, where Team Europe and Team USA face each other in the 45th staging of the competition. While the corresponding session was tied two years ago in Rome, the overall outcome never looked in doubt for Europe, who secured a 16.5-11.5 victory. It was the fifth successive Ryder Cup victory for the team playing on home soil, but Europe will be looking to emulate the last away win in the competition, when they prevailed 14.5-13.5 in Illinois 13 years ago

programme.desc: Aston Villa v Fulham (Kick-off 2.00pm). Coverage of the Premier League match from Villa Park. The hosts are looking to pick up their first win at this ground this season, having only picked up one point from their previous two home games this campaign in the league. Their last home match saw Villa draw a third consecutive blank at the start of the season, as the lost 3-0 to Crystal Palace

programme.title: Live Super Sunday
programme.desc: Newcastle United v Arsenal (Kick-off 4.30pm). Coverage of the Premier League match from St James Park. The hosts have won the last three meetings at this ground against Arsenal, including two victories here last season. The Magpies won this league fixture last year thanks to a 12th-minute goal from Alexander Isak, before then beating the Gunners 2-0 in the second leg of the League Cup semi-finals to lead them to the final at Wembley Stadium

programme.desc: Kevin Magee investigates the reasons why the number of students being given exemptions from studying Irish at school is on the rise. programme.title: Live: Asia Cup Cricket
programme.sub-title: Live Asia Cup Final: India v Pakistan
programme.desc: India v Pakistan. Coverage from this years final, which takes place at Dubai International Cricket Stadium. India have won this tournament on three of the last four ocassions, including the last event in 2023. The hammered Sri Lanka in the final two years ago after they bowled them out for just 50. programme.desc: AC Milan v Napoli (Kick-off 7.45pm). Coverage of the Italian top-flight match from San Siro. These two sides have a fairly level record over the last six meetings, with both teams winning two games and drawing the other two. programme.sub-title: Live Serie A: Genoa v Lazio
programme.desc: Genoa v Lazio (Kick-off 7.45pm). Coverage of the Italian top-flight match from Stadio Comunale Luigi Ferraris. These two sides last met here back in April in a fiery encounter that saw both teams reduced to 10 men. Sebastian Otoa was sent off for the hosts after just 21 minutes, before Lazio scored either side of the break to take a 2-0 lead. Reda Belahyane was then sent off for the visitors in the 72nd-minute but it didnt affect them as they held on to win 2-0

programme.desc: Part two of two. The victim turns out to have a complicated love life that may have led to the killing, and two other suspects are identified, but the commanders leadership and probity face their sternest test

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: An old friend of Mickeys is knocked off his bike and killed, and the victims brother - a known drug dealer - approaches the detective with a request to investigate whether it was a case of murder. Max persuades Neil to let them pursue the inquiry and shows his commitment to the undercover operation by snorting cocaine with their chief suspect

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: A woman disappears after the man she claims to be her lover is found badly beaten in a hotel room but, even when the assailant is found, nobodys story sounds convincing. The aggrieved husband refuses to believe his wife could be having an affair, and the case takes a further twist when he identifies the attacker as his wifes brother - who died in a traffic accident 15 years ago. Emily Bruni (Personal Affairs) guest stars

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: A man attacks the wrong person in a misjudged effort to take revenge on a boxing coach who abused him during his childhood. When the real culprit is found, still working with children, Banksy has trouble persuading other witnesses to open old wounds and testify against him. It is Neil who persists and gets the vital break, even though he is distracted by the news that his son has leukaemia. Lee Ross (EastEnders) and Robbie Gee (Desmonds) guest star

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: A 15-year-old girl is found wandering the streets, covered in bruises and cigarette burns and obviously confused. She eventually discloses the name of her boyfriend but he refuses to visit her in hospital and it soon becomes clear he is in the business of grooming girls before his uncle forces them into prostitution. Max starts to show signs of strain and his increasingly erratic behaviour causes tensions within the team

programme.title: Home Fires
programme.desc: Miriam fears the consequences of David learning the truth, while Steph hides a secret that threatens the farms future. Teresas past comes back to haunt her in the shape of an unexpected visitor who could ruin her new life. Kate and Jack make plans for the future, and Lauras jealousy complicates her relationship with Richard. Erica struggles to save Bob and Pats marriage, and Claire is caught in the crossfire between Frances and Joyce as plans get under way to build a new air raid shelter for the village

programme.title: Home Fires
programme.desc: Frances takes in an evacuee from Liverpool, who is not what she expected. Erica is forced to face the consequences of her actions, while Miriam writes letters to soldiers on the front line that cause more harm than good. Laura and Richards secret affair is jeopardised when someone sees them together, Teresa receives devastating news, and Claire must decide whether or not to stand by Spencer

programme.title: Home Fires
programme.desc: As the war in Europe draws closer to home and the nation faces its darkest hour, the members of the WI find they have their own battles to fight. Alison looks for a way out of her desperate situation, and Frances tries to help Pat while she still can. Miriam keeps an important piece of news from Bryn, and Richard and Laura realise it may not be possible to keep their affair a secret any longer. Conclusion of the Second World War drama, starring Fenella Woolgar and Francesca Annis

programme.title: Catherine Cooksons Colour Blind
programme.desc: Drama from the best-selling author. Set between the wars, it concerns a girl who returns to her Tyneside home newly married to her black husband, only to encounter bigotry from all sides, to say nothing of her obsessed brothers animosity. Niamh Cusack, Tony Armatrading and Dearbhla Molloy star

However, the nuptials cause stress levels to escalate as a catalogue of disasters threaten to spoil the day. Meanwhile, a car crash leaves Dr Turner facing the biggest test of his career when he left to save a precious life, Nancy considers her and Colettes future and Sister Julienne hatches a plan to save Nonnatus House once and for all
